font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I go for a swim in\nthe evening, &nbsp;normally it is a bull\nsession with less swimming and more bull. &nbsp;One subject is usually what I wrote in my\nblog.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So here we were\ndiscussing how the Brits showed their bare as$es to Margaret Thatcher\u2019s\nfuneral. &nbsp;One of my friends suggested\nthat I must dedicate a post to Thatcher.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next day, my friend\nshoved off to the other end of the pool, but after a few metres he turned back\nand headed towards me \u2014and I knew he has something urgent to discuss.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VOlfq35Hpn8/Up_4zD_dFoI/AAAAAAAAoDI/zqomYKJW9kg/s1600/imahrdhges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"240\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-VOlfq35Hpn8/Up_4zD_dFoI/AAAAAAAAoDI/zqomYKJW9kg/s400/imahrdhges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He said \u201c Ajit , you\nare the only guy on &nbsp;the Internet who has\nconnected Margaret Thatcher with the mad cow disease. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rest of\nthe internet denizens have accused her of everything including BO, MO or\nfarting or whatever , but nobody accused her of a cover up of mad cow disease , affecting the health\nof the entire nation\".<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BEuKlkDYRpc/Up_3goUC0JI/AAAAAAAAoCk/g03MhmRBP7U/s1600/Creutzfeldt-Jakob-Disease-CJD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"516\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BEuKlkDYRpc/Up_3goUC0JI/AAAAAAAAoCk/g03MhmRBP7U/s640/Creutzfeldt-Jakob-Disease-CJD.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I replied -- <i style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Indeed ,\nshe has left a UGLY legacy behind. &nbsp;This\nmad cow affair has NOT finished with exterminating all the British cows. &nbsp;There will soon be a human variant to this\ndisease, as people have eaten the beef during the cover up period . &nbsp;Because of Margaret Thatcher\u2019s selfishness and\nFEMALE bulldog stubbornness, she has done immense harm to the mental acuity of\na whole nation , resourceful people who once ruled the planet . &nbsp;We must not forget that she was PM of Britain\nfor 3 terms which finally ended in Nov 1990, with Rothschild\u2019s support and\nadvise.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well this mad cow\nlegacy has now reared its ugly head, as the incubation periods are long.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OpWFp5iBmGY/Up_3mDKF6FI/AAAAAAAAoCs/MBoqDEfdlnM/s1600/dowfdhdnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"348\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-OpWFp5iBmGY/Up_3mDKF6FI/AAAAAAAAoCs/MBoqDEfdlnM/s400/dowfdhdnload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some people may ponder-\nis this captain qualified to talk about such a subject?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To them I will say \u201c I\ncan judge an omelette better than any hen on this planet, and I do NOT need the\nhen\u2019s permission to judge the omelette !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Below:&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to Prof.\nRichard Lacey, </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Prime Minister Margaret\nThatcher knew everything about the mad cow disease , but simply stalled for\ntime. She deceived and lied'.</span></b><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kbcImWJ70Ek/Up_4sJ6XR7I/AAAAAAAAoDA/CnQk87W-82w/s1600/margaret-thatcher-funeral-300-image-3-941066230.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"342\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-kbcImWJ70Ek/Up_4sJ6XR7I/AAAAAAAAoDA/CnQk87W-82w/s640/margaret-thatcher-funeral-300-image-3-941066230.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">However, in response to\npublic outcry, Margaret Thatcher appointed the Southwood Committee to study the\nproblem of BSE for humans in May 1988.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n\n\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In June 1988 , the\nSouthwood Committee recommended that, at least until more is known about BSE,\nall carcasses of affected animals should be destroyed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This recommendation\ncame more than three years after the first suspected case of mad cow disease in\nBritain and more than 18 months after the government's veterinarians had\nconcluded that the disease was caused by feeding rendered meat and bone meal to\ncows. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But nothing was done. &nbsp;Margaret Thatcher was PM till Nov 1990.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In July 1988 , Britain\nbanned the feeding of cattle with meal made from sheep and cattle remains. For\nthe next eight years, Britain continued to export infected meat and bone meal\n(MBM) to Asia, Africa and Eastern Europe\u2014literally getting rid of their inventory of infected\ncows.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unlike pasture-raised\n(grass-fed) cows of the developing world, cows in the West are non-vegetarian.\nAfter a cow is slaughtered and all the meat that can be sold for human\nconsumption is taken away, a lot of the body parts still remains \u2013 heart,\nlungs, brains, intestines, etc. Disposing this waste is very expensive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So, enterprising western farmers grind up this waste and feed it back to their cows. These\nhumpless western cows do not just eat their own kind, they eat crap too. They\nare also fed on a steady diet of poultry waste.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Non-vegetarian diet in various states of decay, they are given lots of\nantibiotics to keep them alive. Yes, human beings who consume the beef also\nassimilate the antibiotics in their bodies. (Another danger that these cows\npose is hormones.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BVCWI7pbMuo/UqN99_LNpCI/AAAAAAAAoJA/5P8J1ETgBIg/s1600/downloff3wad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"339\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-BVCWI7pbMuo/UqN99_LNpCI/AAAAAAAAoJA/5P8J1ETgBIg/s400/downloff3wad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To increase milk supply and accelerate growth rate, farmers\ninject the the cows with lots of hormones. People in the West are suffering\nfrom an epidemic of obesity because they consume hormone-tainted meat. These\npeople are also big consumers of healthcare services and hence the government\ndoes not ban cow hormones.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bIj499u2hps/UqN92wOFYjI/AAAAAAAAoI4/WrT2v_DWmiE/s1600/drugs-chemicals-hormones-antibiotics-heavy-metals-red-meat.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-bIj499u2hps/UqN92wOFYjI/AAAAAAAAoI4/WrT2v_DWmiE/s400/drugs-chemicals-hormones-antibiotics-heavy-metals-red-meat.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 'Southwood Report'\n(which was withheld from publication until 8 February 1989) said that 'The risk\nof transmission of BSE to humans appear remote.' However, it recommended that\npeople stop buying baby food containing cattle innards. But these products\ncontinued to be exported globally.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"color: #92d050; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"color: #92d050; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BAxgXrYgYSE/UqN-LYOCReI/AAAAAAAAoJI/-dO3vDGWG6E/s1600/downlsjdnjoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"318\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-BAxgXrYgYSE/UqN-LYOCReI/AAAAAAAAoJI/-dO3vDGWG6E/s640/downlsjdnjoad.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"color: #92d050; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By September 1989,\nIsrael ( with Rothschild\u2019s input ) and Australia had banned British beef\nimports; the US had done so in 1988. Up to this time, most of the British\npublic were blissfully unaware of mad cow disease and continued to eat beef\nfrom BSE-infected cows. In November 1989, due to pressure from abroad, Britain\nbanned the export of cattle innards.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gu82P7v5zsA/UqN-rt9KdYI/AAAAAAAAoJQ/JwbNMg63xN0/s1600/chicken-disease-cows.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-gu82P7v5zsA/UqN-rt9KdYI/AAAAAAAAoJQ/JwbNMg63xN0/s640/chicken-disease-cows.jpg\" width=\"616\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On 13 May 1990, the\nSunday Times carried the front-page news 'Leading Food Scientist Calls for\nSlaughter of Six Million Cows'. &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nbombshell ( without asking for Margaret Thatcher's concurrence ) came from Richard Lacey, who called for 'authoritative advice from\nmedical doctors instead of all these ministers, vets and civil servants who are\ntelling us that everything is safe'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then in May 1995, the\nhuman form of the mad cow disease, vCJD broke out claiming its first death - a\n19 year old, becoming the first BSE victim. BSE had crossed the species barrier\nfrom cows to humans.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MARGARET THATCHER HENCHWOMAN\nOR HEROINE &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/--s6ducfv27w/Up_34NL0-RI/AAAAAAAAoC0/8f1n7g4zy88/s1600/frequent-play-reduces-your-risk-of-alzheimers.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"387\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/--s6ducfv27w/Up_34NL0-RI/AAAAAAAAoC0/8f1n7g4zy88/s400/frequent-play-reduces-your-risk-of-alzheimers.png\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">John Major the new PM continued with the cover up.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Professor Lacey and his\ncolleague, Stephen Dealler were branded 'bogus' professors; &nbsp;Dr Helen Grant, a\nretired neuro-pathologist and expert on brain diseases was considered 'out of\ndate'; &nbsp;Harsh Narang, the microbiologist who developed a BSE test that can\ndetect the disease in cattle not displaying BSE symptoms was called an\n'opportunist or a lunatic'; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Marja Hovi,\nthe veterinarian who was fired after refusing to certify carcasses as BSE-free.\nShe was described as 'a difficult woman'.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All hell broke loose\nwhen Sir Bernard Tomlinson, the country's leading </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">neuropathologist from Gateshead in northeast\nEngland</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; , went on BBC 4 radio and warned against eating beef burgers or meat pies.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">The Health Secretary at the time, Stephen Dorrell, responded on BBC, saying, ''We have removed from the human food chain the organs that could conceivably be linked to that,'' and ''There is no conceivable risk from what is now in the food chain.''</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The government's spin machine went into\noverdrive.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Prime Minister John Major told the House of Commons that 'there\nis no scientific evidence that BSE can be transmitted to humans'.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Agriculture\nMinister Douglas Hogg reassured the British public that 'the government is\nreceiving the best possible professional and technical advice... that which\nenables us to say with complete confidence that British beef is safe'.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nevertheless, only four\nmonths later, on March 20, 1996, Mr. Dorrell read a fateful statement before a stunned House of Commons that 10 young people had died, and ''the most likely\nexplanation'' was ''exposure to B.S.E.'' That day the world learned the name of\na new disease, disease: new variant C.J.D., or human B.S.E. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mad cow honeymoon\nwas officially over.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AjPg3Xs6NBo/UqN_Ha1C1NI/AAAAAAAAoJY/8SnZVDbrxVA/s1600/Beef2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-AjPg3Xs6NBo/UqN_Ha1C1NI/AAAAAAAAoJY/8SnZVDbrxVA/s400/Beef2.jpg\" width=\"378\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In response, Prof.\nLacey said 'This is one of the most disgraceful episodes in this country's\nhistory and' wanted 'a full and independent inquiry into the conduct of the\ngovernment and the way it has used and misused scientific advisors ... the\ngovernment has been deliberately risking the health of the population for a\ndecade. The reason it didn't take action was that it would be expensive and\ndamaging politically particularly to the farming community who are their\nsupporters ... we are seeing the beginning of a very large number of people\nacquiring the disease in the next century'.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Below: Hormones in meat&nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UaSYm4FN5o8/UqN_e7QrU6I/AAAAAAAAoJg/qGpCC0beIr8/s1600/845813013.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"442\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-UaSYm4FN5o8/UqN_e7QrU6I/AAAAAAAAoJg/qGpCC0beIr8/s640/845813013.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The official cover-up\nof the disease in the 1980s extended to the intimidation of British scientists by Margaret Thatcher , who were threatened not to reveal that Britain was breeding and exporting mad\ncow disease.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an article to the\nGerman daily Frankfurter Allgemeine Zeitung, Dr. Stephen Dealler, a British\nmicrobiologist, and one of the first scientists to warn about the dangers of\nBSE, said that the British government systematically suppressed and manipulated\nscientific research for almost 15 years to keep the truth about BSE from the\npublic. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">According to him,\nresearchers were only allowed to analyse tissue samples from animals with\ngovernment approval.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1987, Dr. Dealler\nwrote about the grave risks of beef contaminated with BSE. Immediately after\nthe publication of his research, he was deprived of all research funding by\nMargaret Thatcher .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1994, Harsh Narang\nwas punished and he was sacked , the government declared his position\n'redundant'. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prof. Lacey was accused\nof 'scare mongering'; his conclusions, 'a mixture of science and science\nfiction' and he 'was certified as mad' by Parliament.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1994, when Germany's\nHealth Minister demanded an import ban for British beef in order to 'end this\nirresponsible experiment on humans', EU Ministers refused to comply.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">By January 1997, the\nGerman government passes an emergency decree to destroy all cattle from\nBritain, Northern Ireland and Switzerland. However in August 1997, it was\ndiscovered that a consignment of British beef was illegally imported. Before\nthe police could act, the beef had been processed into sausage and sold\nthroughout Germany.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On February 21, the BBC\nWorld Service aired an interview with a South Korean parliamentarian who\nexpressed concerns that the Swiss and German governments are planning to export\nbeef that could be BSE-infected to starvation stricken North Korea on \"humanitarian grounds\". &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Welcome to the brave\nnew world of globalisation and trade without borders.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cAll British beef is\nsafe.\u201d&nbsp; Prime Minister Thatcher,\n1988.&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cThere is no danger to the food chain.\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Health Secretary, Kenneth Clarke. 1988. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;\u201cThere is nothing wrong with British\nBeef.\u201d&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;Agriculture Minister, John Gummer. 1989. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cThere is no\nconceivable risk from British Beef.\u201d&nbsp; Health\nSecretary, Steven Dorrell. 1995. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cBritish Beef is\nentirely safe.\u201d&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; Prime Minister,&nbsp; John Major. April 1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cWe shall be culling\nall cattle over 30-months-old.\u201d &nbsp;Agriculture Minister. Douglas Hogg. March\n1996.&nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">A unquantified large\nnumber&nbsp; of British people today carry the\nvariant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease protein </span><b style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prion</b><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">.</span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/DWNcHQ2BOtw/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DWNcHQ2BOtw&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/DWNcHQ2BOtw&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This infectious protein\ncalled Prion resulted from eating toxic beef contaminated with Mad Cow\ndisease.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Australian Red\nCross Blood Service is NOT so stupid. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">British farmers during\nthe PM term of Margaret Thatcher , fed their vegetarian cows with waste non-veg\nmatter . &nbsp;They fed them with animal\nbyproducts &nbsp;which contained the mixed\nmeat and bones of cattle and sheep. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This practice caused\nthe infected brains, nervous systems, and blood of infected cattle to be fed to healthy cows to fatten them up fast.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Obviously, more and more cows became infected\nand more and more cattle began to die.. At least 550,000\nvictim cattle were on the market during the 1980s. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QbHfwinHWsg/UqGkkWln5pI/AAAAAAAAoF8/4i8iHRTekLM/s1600/F_200708_Augygvuust05Ne_348411a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"380\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QbHfwinHWsg/UqGkkWln5pI/AAAAAAAAoF8/4i8iHRTekLM/s640/F_200708_Augygvuust05Ne_348411a.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There was this system\ncalled \u201cfactory-farming\u201d \u2013 where cows were raised in penned areas, in very\nclose quarters, and fed with hormones and other chemicals &nbsp;to fatten them up faster for market .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had to pump the cows with huge amounts of\nantibiotics because the cows &nbsp;became sick\nvery easily because of their terrible living conditions and unsuitable vermin non-veg food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ranchers cut\ncosts by feeding their animals ground-up dead animals, animals that have died\nof disease \u2013 as well as humane society animals, cats and dogs that have been\neuthanized. &nbsp;&nbsp;Pets are almost always\neuthanized by intravenous injection, typically using a very high dose of\npentobarbital or sodium thiopental..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wDEEB5Kqerk/UqGksjWR8SI/AAAAAAAAoGE/eHAJ17E8R44/s1600/_51293718_34._the_culled_dairy_herd_lying_in_the_silage_clamp,_ramscliffe.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"360\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-wDEEB5Kqerk/UqGksjWR8SI/AAAAAAAAoGE/eHAJ17E8R44/s640/_51293718_34._the_culled_dairy_herd_lying_in_the_silage_clamp,_ramscliffe.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Cows were also fed with\n&nbsp;offal, parts of the animals not fit for\nhuman consumption. &nbsp;This process of\ngrinding up diseased, dead animals for feed for other animals was called\n\u201crendering.\u201d <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Their digestive system\nof vegetarian cows meant for green grass &nbsp;cannot stay healthy when they are fed the\nwrong diet, especially when the ground up dead animals are used for food, and so\nthey died from disease! &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BZ1e_c0DH-0/UqGkKfUzUcI/AAAAAAAAoFs/g9b1zuOGQs4/s1600/imad32dges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-BZ1e_c0DH-0/UqGkKfUzUcI/AAAAAAAAoFs/g9b1zuOGQs4/s400/imad32dges.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These dead cows\nwere again ground up into paste and fed to other living cows. The result was\nmad cow disease where the brains of the cows were affected and converted into\nspongy matter.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the guise of \u201cmodern\nindustrial cattle-farming\u201d , cow feed contained deadly mixtures of antibiotics, hormones, and protein supplements.\n&nbsp;Whatever little grass they ate were&nbsp;contaminated with deadly pesticides\nand toxic fertilisers.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Margaret Thatcher and\nher Govt &nbsp;conspired to cover-up, distort\nand withhold the facts from the public. &nbsp;Whistle-blower trying to warn the\ninnocent and gullible public were threatened with law suits, for spreading\nfalse rumours. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The cattle industry sued\nOprah Winfrey and her guest, Cattle Rancher Howard Lyman, because they told the\ntruth about the cover-up of Mad Cow Disease, also called bovine spongiform\nencephalopathy (BSE).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mad Cow disease can be\npassed from the mother to the fetus in the womb.&nbsp; Bulls passed the disease to a cow through its\nsperm.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The English government finally\ndestroyed over 5.1 million cattle and incinerated them at a temperature of 1150\ndegrees centigrade. &nbsp;The resulting ash is\nstill considered infectious and is stored in WW ll blimp hangers. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">High heat cannot destroy the protein Prion.&nbsp; An unquantified large number&nbsp; British people today carry the variant\nCreutzfeldt-Jakob disease protein Prion. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Documents unearthed showed the Margaret\nThatcher\u2019s government officials was warned to cull cattle as early as 1988 amid fears BSE\ncould spread to and kill humans. &nbsp;But her QUEEN BEE female attitude refused to see reason. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">British scientists and\ntheir relatives in the know began boycotting beef during the late 1980s \u2013 even\nthough the Thatcher Government was still telling the public it was safe to eat.\n&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By February 1988 secret memos warned BSE\ncould pass between species through infected meat and pass to humans , with\nfatal results. &nbsp;Experts warned Margaret Thatcher again and again that there was\n\u201ca real possibility that doing nothing could prove extremely costly\u201d. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Thatcher was reluctant to cull cattle to\ncontain the disease because of the cost\u2014and she always took advise from\nRothschild. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Thatcher cabinet\nrefused to act on independent and government evidence proving high-protein-non veg feed\nwas spreading the disease.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IqcB7q5_37Y/UqI-azwLHiI/AAAAAAAAoHo/N5xnxYhiTso/s1600/1365893161-demonstration-party-to-celebrate-death-of-margaret-thatcher-in-london_1955877.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"440\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IqcB7q5_37Y/UqI-azwLHiI/AAAAAAAAoHo/N5xnxYhiTso/s640/1365893161-demonstration-party-to-celebrate-death-of-margaret-thatcher-in-london_1955877.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stopping the production of contaminated feed</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and\nculling the few herds affected in 1987, would have saved\nmillions of cattle from a futile end in the incinerator, and this impending disaster to mankind.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Typically, the Tory\ncabinet left it to the farmer to report any new cases. A farmer who saw ten\ncows showing the early signs of BSE, the slight change in colour of the udder,\ncould take them to market, and get \u00a35,000. &nbsp;Or report them to MAFF and,\neventually, receive \u00a32,500.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Accused\nof&nbsp; gross incompetence from both sides of\nthe Commons the cabinet decided to pay farmers the full market price. By this\ntime, thousands of greedy and NIL conscience British farmers had knowingly\ntaken BSE cows to market. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">From Dec 1990 onwards\nMargaret Thatcher\u2019s replacement, John Major, continued suppressing the known\ndanger of BSE crossing to humans. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Tu4Y0sdDMKk/UqI8LYKLX-I/AAAAAAAAoHc/y34dVvP5IJA/s1600/xdghjk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Tu4Y0sdDMKk/UqI8LYKLX-I/AAAAAAAAoHc/y34dVvP5IJA/s400/xdghjk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Unless she is\npermanently stoned out of her mind. It would be churlish to pretend the Queen\nplayed no part in this homicidal cover-up. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cv2-JqOPQm4/UqI8BBSUFII/AAAAAAAAoHU/FpP9lZi0QO0/s1600/imagesCAIIGZQR.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"306\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-cv2-JqOPQm4/UqI8BBSUFII/AAAAAAAAoHU/FpP9lZi0QO0/s400/imagesCAIIGZQR.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Queen also knew\nwhat transpired when Winston Churchill whose mother Jenny Jerome is Rotshchild,\ndecided to starve 5.2 million Bengalis to death as punishment.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-FTtXezgcXKA/UqI77vxLlXI/AAAAAAAAoHM/WATigJDJM5I/s1600/edcsa.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>AMARTYA SEN GETS NOBEL\nPRIZE FOR WHITEWASHING CHURCHILL'S INDIAN HOLOCAUST VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cLRe_dg59BU/UqI71yZ1QII/AAAAAAAAoHE/nUAhw8MVT3w/s1600/sfghju.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"626\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-cLRe_dg59BU/UqI71yZ1QII/AAAAAAAAoHE/nUAhw8MVT3w/s640/sfghju.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Government Meat\nInspectors were made to sign Her Majesty's Official Secrets Act. Under John\nMajor - a Meat Inspector who found BSE meat going into the local butchers shop,\nwould go to jail - if he told you.</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Today a lot of English\npeople are silent carriers of variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease protein Prion.\nThough the incubation period is long and death may occur years later &nbsp;, the people become dimwits.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bovine spongiform\nencephalopathy (BSE), or &nbsp;mad cow\ndisease, is a fatal neurodegenerative disease (encephalopathy) in cattle that\ncauses a spongy degeneration in the brain and spinal cord. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fvxLqNRQk0E/UqGkAGeCo4I/AAAAAAAAoFk/Iw9_tu5gRFU/s1600/3726807.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"528\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-fvxLqNRQk0E/UqGkAGeCo4I/AAAAAAAAoFk/Iw9_tu5gRFU/s640/3726807.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">BSE has a long incubation period, about\n30 months to 8 years, usually affecting adult cattle at a peak age onset of four\nto five years, all breeds being equally susceptible.&nbsp; The incubation period of variant\nCreutzfeldt-Jakob disease in humans takes decades. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rendering was a $3 billion-a-year industry in USA . \u201cThere is simply no such thing in America as an animal\ntoo ravaged by disease, too cancerous, or too putrid to be welcomed by the\nembracing arms of the renderer. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The mad cow disease\nalso has been confirmed in cattle born in Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic,\nDenmark, Finland, France, Germany, Italy, Ireland, Israel, Japan, Liechtenstein,\nLuxembourg, the Netherlands, Poland, Portugal, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain,\nSwitzerland, and the U.K.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The American Red Cross\nhas established strict restrictions on individuals' eligibility to donate\nblood. Individuals who have spent a cumulative time of 3 months or more in the\nUnited Kingdom between 1980 and 1996, or a cumulative time of 5 years or more\nfrom 1980 to present in any combination of country(ies) in Europe, are\nprohibited from donating blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Association of\nBlood Donors of Denmark precludes potential donors who have spent a cumulative\ntime of at least 12 months in the United Kingdom between 1 January 1980 and 31\nDecember 1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Singapore Red Cross\nprecludes potential donors who have spent a cumulative time of three months or\nmore in the United Kingdom between 1980 and 1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A &nbsp;policy applies to potential donors to the\nAustralian Red Cross' Blood Service, precluding people who have spent a\ncumulative time of six months or more in the United Kingdom between 1980 and\n1996.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The UK government\nbanned anyone who had received a blood transfusion since January 1980 from\ndonating blood.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">From 1999 there has\nbeen a ban in the UK for using UK blood to manufacture fractional products such\nas albumin.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There were NO madcow\ncases reported in Argentina, Australia, Brazil, New Zealand, Uruguay, and\nVanuatu, where herbivorous cows fed outside on grass pasture . In Australia,\nveggie grain feeding is done only as a final finishing process before the\nanimals are slaughtered for meat.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201cBritish government\nofficials misled the public for years over the dangers of British beef and the\nrisk of \u201cmad cow\u201d (BSE) disease spreading to humans,\u201d &nbsp;<b>Reuters wire service.</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The BSE crisis led to\nthe European Union banning exports of British beef with effect from March 1996;\nthe ban would last for 10 years before it was finally lifted on 1 May 2006,\ndespite several immoral attempts in May 1996 by British prime minister John\nMajor to get the ban lifted<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of people in UK\nare silent carriers of the infectious long incubation prion protein that causes\nvariant Creutzfeldt\u2013Jakob disease (vCJD). &nbsp;&nbsp;Due to\nthe long incubation period, the full extent of the human vCJD outbreak is still\nnot known.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vCJD&nbsp;&nbsp; OR variant Creutzfeldt-Jakob disease &nbsp;related disease can incubate for probably 50\nyears, as per some scientists. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prions only seem to more\nconcentrated &nbsp;in nervous system tissue. .\n&nbsp;In the brain, these &nbsp;proteins cause native cellular prion protein\nto deform into the infectious state, which then goes on to deform further prion\nprotein in an exponential cascade. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The abnormal prion\ntouches a normal prion and changes the normal prion's shape into an abnormal\none, thereby destroying the normal prion's original function. The nerve cell\ntries to get rid of the abnormal prions by clumping them together in small sacs\nthat merge with its \"stomach\" (lysosome). Because the nerve cells\ncannot digest the abnormal prions, they accumulate in the lysosomes.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zhKPj1SH6fw/UqQVIlSuBTI/AAAAAAAAoLQ/I0QbRhkL8U8/s1600/imadsgges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"281\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-zhKPj1SH6fw/UqQVIlSuBTI/AAAAAAAAoLQ/I0QbRhkL8U8/s640/imadsgges.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above: &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The prion mode of\naction is very different to bacteria and viruses as they are simply proteins,\ndevoid of any genetic material. Once a misfolded prion enters a healthy person\nit converts correctly-folded proteins into the disease-associated form.&nbsp;</span></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A prion is neither a\nvirus nor a bacteria. Prions are proteins that contain no DNA or RNA, two\nsubstances previously felt to be essential for reproduction of a living tissue.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nlysosomes grow and engorge the nerve cell, which eventually dies. When the cell\ndies, the abnormal prions are released to infect other cells. Large,\nsponge-like holes are left where many cells die. Numerous nerve cell deaths\nlead to loss of brain function, and the person eventually dies.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; These babies are born with\nlarge heads . This disease is called Normal pressure hydrocephalus NPH which is\na a build-up of fluid inside the skull, which leads to brain swelling. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Normal pressure\nhydrocephalus (NPH) is a rise in cerebrospinal fluid (CSF) in the brain that\naffects brain function. However, the pressure of the fluid is usually normal. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">As CSF (cerebrospinal\nfluid) builds up in the brain, the fluid-filled chambers (ventricles) of the\nbrain swell. This causes pressure on brain tissue. This can damage or destroy\nparts of the brain.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">DNA contains\ninstructions which get re-written in RNA, and then the instructions in RNA get\ntranslated into protein. So changes in a person\u2019s DNA can cause changes in the\nproteins their cells produce. Everyone has a gene called PRNP which codes for\nthe protein called PrP, and most of the time this protein is perfectly healthy\nand fine. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Though\nboth nitric oxide (NO) and hydrogen sulfide have been shown to relax blood\nvessels, their mechanisms of action are different: while NO activates the\nenzyme guanylyl cyclase, H2S activates ATP-sensitive potassium channels in\nsmooth muscle cells. Nitric oxide does most of the vessel-relaxing work in\nlarge vessels and hydrogen sulfide is responsible for similar action in smaller\nblood vessels. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Abandoned in the woods by their parents during a time of hunger, they were taken in by an old woman living in a cottage made of gingerbread and candy. Gretel asked the woman to look inside the oven to see if it was hot enough, and then pushed her in and slammed the door<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">We heard of the MOUSE TOWER OF BINGEN -<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The land of the prince-bishop of Bingen, a district on the Rhine river above Cologne, had suffered a severe short-fall in its harvest, and food was in very short supply. Nevertheless, the bishop demanded that everyone pay him their full rents and taxes in money and in kind. He then used the money to buy up what food remained in the market, and stored all of it in the fortress tower in which he lived. He dismissed all of his dependents and servants, and then shut and locked all of the gates and doors to the tower in order to be sure that people would not try to enter and steal the food he had hoarded there. But he need not have worried about that -- the people were all gone. They had eaten every blade of grass and every kernel of grain in the land. Some had died, while others had fled and left the bishop as the only living person in Bingen. Just as he was congratulating himself on having been clever enough to have survived the great hunger in comfort, he heard noises outside and at the doors. He rushed to the top of the tower and saw a terrible sight. All of the starving rats and mice from the entire region had smelled the food and were hurrying toward his tower.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">There are records of King Edward II, of England and King Louis X of France being starved of food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Herman Melville commonly made the concept of male homosexuality and cannibalism interchangeable<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CANNIBALISM LEADS TO HOMOSEXUALITY AND LEFT HANDED BABIES DUE TO CORRUPTION OF DNA PROGRAM.. These include:<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Kuru belongs to a class of diseases called transmissible spongiform encephalopathies (TSEs), also called prion diseases. It primarily affects the cerebellum \u2014 the part of your brain responsible for coordination and balance.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Unlike most infections or infectious agents, kuru is not caused by a bacteria, virus, or fungus. Infectious, abnormal proteins known as prions cause kuru. Prions are not living organisms and do not reproduce. They are inanimate, misshapen proteins that multiply in the brain and form clumps, hindering normal brain processes.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">ReplyDelete<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Replies<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: #f3f3f3; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Capt.
