font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Phosphorus&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 523 mg (75%)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Potassium&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 429 mg (9%)</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zinc&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; 4 mg (42%)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium 18%<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The common symptoms of\nbrain fog, &nbsp;senility, and overall\ndecreased cognitive functions in those who are <b><span style=\"color: red;\">selenium</span></b> deficient. &nbsp;Even the brain and neurotransmitters \u201ctake a\nback seat\u201d to the functioning of the thyroid in regards to selenium status\nwithin the body. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A low selenium status is also indicated in\nthose who struggle with depression and mood disorders.&nbsp; &nbsp;And,\nfinally, selenium has been proven a powerful anti-carcinogenic supplement\ninhibiting cancer cells and reducing the risk of several cancers including\nprostate, breast, and uterine cancers. </span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium works in tandem with\nanother nutrient better known for its role in thyroid health: iodine. Selenium is responsible for the properly\nrecycling of iodine in the body, so a person with too little selenium as well\nas too little iodine is much more likely to develop a significant thyroid\nimbalance.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Adequate selenium\nnutrition supports efficient thyroid hormone synthesis and metabolism and protects\nthe thyroid gland from damage from excessive iodine exposure In cases of severe\nselenium deficiency, conversion of T4 to T3 may be impaired, leading to\nhypothyroid symptoms.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is thought that selenium deficiency does not\nspecifically cause illness by itself, but that it makes the body more\nsusceptible to illnesses caused by other nutritional, biochemical or infectious\nstresses, due to its role in immune function. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Selenium is involved in\nDNA repair and is associated with a reduced risk for cancer, especially colon\ncancer.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">Manganese</span></b> helps to\nnourish brain cells and the nerves. &nbsp;It helps transmission of electrical signal\nin body and thus proper coordination of brain, nerves and muscles. &nbsp;Epilepsy or\nseizure disorder are associated with low manganese levels in blood and thus can\nbe treated with manganese supplements.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manganese\nparticipate in production of sex hormones and maintaining reproductive health. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 115%;\">It is involved in normal reproductive and\nfunction of mammary glands.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reproductive\nfunction in manganese deficient patients is characterized&nbsp; by defective ovulation, ovarian and\ntesticular degeneration, and increased infant mortality. Significant health\nbenefits of manganese have been found for women who suffer from premenstrual\nsyndrome.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It reduces cramps, mood swings and other PMS symptoms in women. Manganese\nis crucial for treating blood sugar and insulin issues. Manganese improves\nthyroid function and any deficiency may result in hypothyroidism. Manganese\ndeficiency causes nausea, vomiting, dizziness, skin rash, high blood sugar or\nbone loss.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Prolonged deficiency of manganese may cause retarded growth,\ndigestive disorders, abnormal bone development and deformities, sterility and\nsexual impotence in men.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It helps to form\nglucosamine, required for bone cartilage and lubricating fluid in joints and\nthus joint mobility.&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Manganese is an\nanti-oxidant and helps remove free radicals from body</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The<span style=\"color: red;\"><b> zinc</b></span> promotes bone\nhealth and prevents osteoporosis later in life. Zinc is&nbsp; good for sexual health&nbsp; and it can help testosterone and sperm\nproduction in men.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oats are a unique\ncereal due to its relatively high protein content for vegetarians , and its\ndistinct protein composition compared to other cereals. &nbsp;Eating oatmeal can lower your cholesterol\nlevels as it is made up of dietary fibres that helps lower the bad cholesterol\n(LDL) without lowering the good one (HDL). &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Eating a cup of oats every day with a\nhigh-fibre, low-fat diet can do wonders in preventing heart disease. The\nantioxidants present in oats reduce the ability of the blood cells to stick to\nthe insides of the artery walls and thus reduce cholesterol.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Soluble fiber breaks\ndown as it passes through the digestive tract, forming a gel that traps some\nsubstances related to cholesterol, such as cholesterol-rich bile acids. This\nentrapment reduces the absorption of cholesterol into the bloodstream. The bad\ncholesterol, LDL, is trapped without lowering good cholesterol (HDL).&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\naccumulation of cholesterol is implicated in many types of cardiovascular\ndisease.&nbsp; Oats, like all\ncholesterol-lowering agents, are most effective when consumed as part of a\nlow-fat, high-fiber diet taken together with plenty of exercise.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Diabetics should\nconsume oats regularly as oat beta-glucan delays the fall in blood sugar levels\nbefore meals and slows the rise after a meal.&nbsp;\nThis means, there aren\u2019t major changes in its level and your diabetes is\nbetter controlled.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The high levels of\nmagnesium nourish the body\u2019s proper use of glucose and insulin secretion. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Magnesium acts as a\nco-factor for more than 300 enzymes, including enzymes involved in the body's\nuse of glucose and insulin secretion.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As the beta-glucan in\nthe soluble fiber of oats is digested, it forms a gel, which causes the\nviscosity of the contents of the stomach and small intestine to be increased.\nThis in turn slows down digestion and prolongs the absorption of carbohydrates\ninto the bloodstream. This means dramatic changes in blood sugar levels are\navoided.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Oats contain a compound\ncalled lignin which helps reduce chances of hormone-related cancers like\nbreast, prostate and ovarian cancer. Women who have a higher intake of fibre\nhave lower levels of circulating oestrogen and are at a lesser risk of breast\ncancer.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If you suffer from high\nblood pressure, a daily dose of oats will help you reduce it along with other\ncomplications that it can lead to. &nbsp;Regularly\nhaving oats lowers the cholesterol levels in the body. Oats contains low levels\nof sodium. &nbsp;This reduces the risk of\ncontracting high blood pressure.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">People consuming are\nless likely to develop persistent asthma.&nbsp;\nThe beta glucans boost defenses of the immune system agains bacteria,\nviruses, fungi, and parasites.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nothing says \"good\nmorning\" like a warm bowl of oatmeal .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2oQPOCSFgeI/UpTsz08aV_I/AAAAAAAAoAE/Vmnbk-KgmB4/s1600/recipe-image-leggshacy-id--923_12.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-2oQPOCSFgeI/UpTsz08aV_I/AAAAAAAAoAE/Vmnbk-KgmB4/s320/recipe-image-leggshacy-id--923_12.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><b>Grace and peace!</b></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/4gPv2rTdefQ/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/4gPv2rTdefQ&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/4gPv2rTdefQ&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: Times New Roman, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">'Sri Subrahmanya\nBhujangam'<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">(Subramanya Bhujangam\nis a stotra sung under inspiration by Sri Aadi Sankara at Tiruchendur.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When he meditated upon\nSri Subramanya, he became aware of a self luminous light shining in his heart<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">and words came out his\nmouth in extempore in bhujanga metre).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">1.&nbsp;&nbsp; sadA bAlaroopApi vighnAdhi hanthri,\nmahAdanthi vaktrApi panchAsyamAnyA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; vidheendhrAdhi mrigyA gaNeshAbhidhAme,\nvidhatthAm shriyam kApi kalyANamurthi :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Though He always\nsports the appearance of a child, He can crumble the mountains of obstacles.\nThough He is elephant-faced, He is honoured even by his five-faced father Shiva\n(sadyojaatam, vaamadevam, aghoram, tatpurusham and iishaanam). Lord Brahma,\nIndra and the other Devas seek him to fulfil their aspirations. He is known as\nGanesha and He is endowed with boundless glory. May He bless me with\nprosperity!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">2.&nbsp;&nbsp; na jAnAmi padhyam, na jAnAmi gadhyam, na\njAnAmi shabdam, na jAnAmi chArttham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; chidekA shadAsyA hridhi dhyothathe me,\nmukhAnis saranthe giraschApi chitram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{I know not the science\nof musical sounds, I know not the meanings of complex texts either, I know not\nthe nature of shlokas made of four types of padaas, nor do I know the\nintricacies of the gadhyam style! But in my heart, shines an effulgent light\nwith six luminous faces, and because of that, from my mouth, amazing phrases\nwith musical tone and meanings pour out in extempore}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">3.&nbsp;&nbsp; mayUrAdhiroodam mahAvAkyagUdam manohArideham\nmahachittageham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mahIdevadevam mahavedabhAvam\nmahadevabAlam bhaje lokapAlam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{O Son of Mahadeva!\nSeated on the peacock chariot, being the essence of the great maha vaakyaas,\nhaving wonderfully attractive body, dwelling in the heart of great sages, O the\nquintessence of four Vedas! Thou are indeed the Lord of the Universe}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">4.&nbsp;&nbsp; yadhA sannidhAnam gathA mAnavA me, bhavAm\nbodhipAram gathAsthe thadhaiva<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; ithi vyanjayan sindhutheere ya aaste,\nthameede pavitram parAshaktiputram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{O Lord Subramanya! Son\nof spotless Parashakti [the Mother of the Cosmos], Thou have taken your abode\nnear the sea shore Tiruchendur as if it is an indication that whenever the\ndevotees take refuge in Thee, they can easily cross the ocean of samsara (the\neternal cycle of life and death) and reach the other side of the shore\nsafely!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">5.&nbsp;&nbsp; yathAbdhes tharangA layam yAnthi thungA,\nthatthaivA padha sannidhou sevyamAne<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; itheevormi panktheer nrinAm\ndarshayantham, sadA bhAvaye hrithsaroje guham tham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{The waves of worries\nthat haunt the minds of the devotees get destroyed like the waves of the ocean\nwhen they hit the shore; Thou stands on the sea-side town of Tiruchendur\nexemplifying this truth that the mental worry-waves get destroyed when the\ndevotees surrender themselves at Thy feet. O Lord Guha (one who resides in the\ncave of the heart)! I meditate on you always!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">6.&nbsp;&nbsp; girou mannivAse narA yedhi rUdA :, thadhA\nparvathe rAjathe thedhirUdA :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; itheeva bruvan gandha shailAdhirUdah :,\nsadevo mudhe me sadA shanmukhostu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{O Lord Shanmukha! Thou\nstands on the top of the Sugandha hill, proclaiming that whenever the devotees\nclimb this hill it will give the same benefit as climbing the king of mountains\n(Kailas)! May the six-faced Lord on the Sugandha hills remain there to bless\nme!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">7.&nbsp;&nbsp; mahAmbodhitheere mahApApachore,\nmuneendrAnukoole sugandhAkhya shaile<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; guhAyAm vasantham svabhAsA lasantham,\njanArthim harantham shrayAmo guham tham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{On the shores of the\ngreat ocean which steals away the sins of the devotees, stands the Sugandha\nhills, the most favourable site for the sages to perform their penance! Thou\nresides there to destroy the worries of the devotees! O self-luminous Lord who\nis present in the cave of the heart! I adore Thee!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">8.&nbsp;&nbsp; lasat swarna gehai nrinAm kAmadohe,\nsumasthoma sanchanna mANikya manche<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; samudyath sahasrArka thulyaprakAsham,\nsadA bhAvaye kArtikeyam suresham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{In a radiant golden\nbedroom, on a cot set with rubies and covered on all sides with sweet smelling\nflowers, Thou art seated with the effulgence of a thousand suns! Thou art the\nanswer to every desire of the heart and Thou fulfils the righteous desires of Thy\ndevotees! Thou art the Lord of Devas and son of the Lord of the universe! O\nKartikeya I meditate on Thee!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">9.&nbsp;&nbsp; raNat hamsake manjuleth yanthashoNe,\nmanohAri lAvaNya peeyusha poorNe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; manash : - shatpadho me bhava klesha\ntaptha :, sadA modathAm skanda te pAda padme<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Let the mind (like a\nbee) which is burdened with domestic troubles become happy by hovering around\nThy lotus feet which is adorned with the jingling ringlets made of rings and\nbeads, red in color indicating grace, filled with the nectar of beauty which\nattracts the minds of the devotees}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10.&nbsp; suvarnAbha divyAm barodh bhAsa mAnam, kvaNath\nkinkiNi mekhalA shobha mAnam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; lasad dhemapattena vidhyotha mAnam,\nkatim bhAvaye Skanda te deepya mAnam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Skanda, I meditate\non Thy waist which is covered by a gold coloured cloth, shining with a string\nof ringing bells and beads, wearing a shining gold belt over the golden silk\ncloth, and which is by itself self-resplendent}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">11.&nbsp; pulindesha kanyA ghanA bhoga thunga, sthanA\nlinganA saktha kAshmeera rAgam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; namasyAmyaham tArakAre tavorah :,\nsvabhaktA vane sarvadA sAnurAgam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! conqueror of\nTarakasura! By embracing Valli's (hunter's daughter) well-developed breast\nornated with saffron, Thy chest became red coloured, thereby manifesting your\neternal grace towards devotees. And such a chest I adore}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">12.&nbsp; vidhou kluptha dhandAn svaleelA dhri thAndAn,\nnirasthebha shundAn dvishath kAladhandAn<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; hathendhrAri shandAn jagatrAna shoundAn,\nsadA te prachandAn shraye bAhu dhandAn<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Shanmukha! Thy\narms punished Brahma, Thy arms govern the world as Thy play; Thy arms killed\nSoorapadma and other demons who are enemies of Indra; Thy arms are matchless in\nprotecting the Universe, and Thy arms are a terror to Thine enemies. I worship\nThy twelve arms which do all these things effortlessly}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">13.&nbsp; sadA shAradA : shan mrugAngkA yadhisyu :,\nsamudyantha eva stthithAsh cheth samanthAth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; sadApoorna bimbA : kalankaishcha heenA\n:, tadA tvan mukhAnAm bruve Skanda sAmyam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{What can I compare to\nThy six faces! If there be six full moons free from blemishes and if those\nmoons be ever shining on all sides, even then they would be no match to your\neffulgent faces}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">14.&nbsp; sphuran mandahAsai : sahamsAni chanchath,\nkatAkshA valeebhringa sanghojvalAni<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;sudhAsyandhi bimbA dharANi shasoono, tavA\nlokaye shanmukhAm bhoruhANi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Son of\nParameshwara, I see Thy six smiling faces shining like a group of swans, having\ngleaming side glances ever moving like a row of bees and with red lips\noverflowing with nectar}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">15.&nbsp; vishAleshu karNAntha dheergesh vajasram,\ndayAs yandhishu dvAdha shas veekshaNeshu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mayeeshath katAkshas : sakruth pAthi\ntashcheth, bhavethe dayAsheela kA nAma hAni :<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Son of\nParameshwara! Oh Merciful Lord! When Thou hast twelve broad long eyes extending\nupto ears, what will Thou lose by casting that side glance for a moment (on me)\n? }.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">16.&nbsp; suthAngodhbhavo mesi jeevethi shad dhA,\njapanmantra meesho mudhA jigrathe yAn<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; jagad bhAra bhridbhyo jagannAtha thebhya\n:, kireeto jvalebhyo namo mastakebhya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Lord of the\nUniverse! I offer my prostration to Thy six heads wearing crowns with brilliant\nrubies which protect the welfare of creatures, which were smelt by Parameshwara\nwith joy uttering six times the mantra \"Child Thou were born of me, May\nThou live long\"}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">17.&nbsp; sphuradh ratna keyoora hArAbhi rAma, chalath\nkuNdala shri-lasadh kandabhAga<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; katou peethavAsA kare chArushakti,\npurasthAn ma mAsthAm purAres thanooja<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Kumara! Son of Lord\nParameshwara (who destroyed Tripura)! With garlands of brilliant rubies on Thy\nshoulders and chest, with bright cheeks shining with pendants dangling from Thy\nears, wearing silk garment around Thy waist, and with Vel in Thy hand, Oh! Lord\nappear before me (It is said that Lord appeared before Acharya when he sung\nthis stotra)!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">18.&nbsp; ihAyAhi vatsethi hasthAn prasArya,\naah-vayath-yAdha-rAch-shankare mAthu rankAth<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; samuthpathya thAtham shrayantham\nkumAram, harAshlishta gAthram bhaje bAlamoorthim<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{When Lord Shankara\ncalled Thee affectionately with arms extended, Thou hurriedly rose from\nMother's lap and rushed into Shankara's arms who embraced Thee affectionately.\nI meditate on such a Lord Kumara}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">19.&nbsp; kumAresha soono Guhaskanda senA, pathe shaktipAne\nmayUrAdhirUda<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; pulindhAthmajA kAntha bhakthArthi hArin,\nprabho tArakAre sadA raksha mAm tvam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Kumara! Oh Son of\nLord of the Universe! One who shines in the cave of the heart as Guha! Oh\nSkanda! Oh Lord of the Devas' Army! Oh Wielder of the weapon Vel which is the\nsvarupa of Parashakti! One who rides on the peacock chariot! Oh Beloved of the\nHunter's daughter (Valli)! Destroyer of the sins of your devotees! Enemy of\nTarakasura! Oh Lord protect me!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">20.&nbsp; prashAn thendriye nashta samngnye vicheshte,\nkaphod kArivaktre bhayoth kampi gAthre<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; prayANon mukhe mayyanAthe thadhAneem,\ndrutham me dhayALo bhavAgre guham tham<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Hail Guha, Dayalo.\nDuring the last moments of my life, when I will have lost control of my senses,\nwhen I will have lost consciousness, when I will be unable move my limbs, when\nI will be emitting foam of phlegm, when my body will be trembling with fear of\ndeath, when I will have none to protect me, Thou must hasten to give me\ndarshan}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">21.&nbsp; krithAn thasya dhooteshu chandeshu kopAth,\ndaha chindhi bhindheethi mAm tharja yatsu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; mayUram samAruhya mAbhairi thitvam,\npurash shakti pAnir mamAyAhi sheegram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Lord, when\nferocious messengers of the God of Death come to torture me angrily shouting,\n\"Burn him, Kill him\", Oh! Lord Thou must hasten to appear before me,\nriding on your peacock,carrying Shaktivel, to encourage me not to be afraid}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">22.&nbsp; praNam yAsa kruth pAda yosthe pathitvA,\nprasAdya prabho prArthaye (a)nekavAram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; na vaktum kshamoham thadhAneem\nkrupApdhe, na kAryAnthakAle manA gapyu pekshA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Merciful Lord! I am\nprostating to Thy feet often to secure Thy blessings. Oh treasure house of mercy!\nI offer prayers to please Thee. Thou should not be indifferent towards me\nduring my last moments. At that time I may not have the control and energy to\npray to Thee!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">23.&nbsp; sahasrAnda bhokthA tvayA ShooranAmA, hathas\ntArakas simhavaktrascha dhaitya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;\nmamAnthar hridhistham manaklesha mekam, na hamsi prabho kim karomi kva\nyAmi<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{O Lord! Thou hast\nslain the demon Soora who ruled the thousand universes! So were the demons\nTaarakasura and Simhavaktra. But Lord,why have you not killed the demon called mental\nworry which haunts my mind? When it is afflicting me, what will I do? And where\nwill I go [other than you for help] ? }.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">24.&nbsp; aham sarvadA dukkha bhArA vasanno, bhavAn\ndeenabandhus tva dhanyam na yAche<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; bhavadh bhaktirodham sadA kluptha bAdham,\nmamAdhim drutham nAsha yo mAsuta tvam<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Son of Uma! I am\nalways troubled by the mental worries. Thou art the friend of helpless! I\napproach none but you for saving me. Quickly destroy my mental worries as they\ninterfere with my devotion towards Thee!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">25.&nbsp; apasmAra kushta kshayArsha prameha,\njvaronmAdha gulmAdhi rogA mahAntha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; pishAchAshcha sarve bhavatpatra\nbhoothim, vilokya kshanAth tArakAre dravanthe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Conqueror of\nTaraka! Severe epilepsy, leprosy, consumption, lung diseases, venereal diseases,\nfevers, mental diseases of all types, they run away the moment they see Thy\nvibhuti contained in a leaf}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">26.&nbsp; drishi skandamoorthih shrutou skandakeerthih,\nmukhe me pavitram sadA tach-charitram<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; kare tasya krityam vapus tasya bhrutyam,\nguhe santu leenA mamA shesha bhAvA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Always may I have\nbefore my eyes the murthi of Lord Skanda! Always let my ears hear only the\npraises of Lord Skanda! Always let my mouth sing the praise of Lord Skanda!\nAlways let my hands be of service to the Lord! Always let my body be a servant\nto the Lord! Let my limbs, thoughts and actions be devoted to Skanda!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">27.&nbsp; muneenA muthAho nriNAm bhakti bhAjAm,\nabheeshta pradhA santhi sarvatra devA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; nriNA manthya jAnAm api svArtha dhAne,\nguhA devam anyam najAne najAne<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{In all the worlds\nthere are Devas to grant the boons of sages and great bhaktas. But for the\nlowly and ordinary devotees, I know not of any other Deity to protect them\nexcept Guha!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">28.&nbsp; kaLathram suthA bandhuvarga pashurvA, naro\nvAtha nAree gruhe ye madheeyA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; yajantho namanthah stuvantho bhavantham,\nsmaran thascha te santu sarve kumAra<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh Lord Kumara! Let my\nwife, children, relatives, friends, other men and women in our household,\nvenerate Thee! Praise Thee! And always be absorbed in Thy thoughts!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">29.&nbsp; mrigA pakshiNo dhamshakA ye cha dushtAs,\ntathA vyAdhayo bhAdha kA ye madhange<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; bhavacchakti teekshnAgra bhinnAs\nsudhoore, vinashyantu te choorNitha krouncha shaile<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Oh! Destroyer of\nKrauncha Shaila! Let every thing that troubles my body, birds, beasts, insects,\nsevere diseases, be pierced by Thy powerful weapon Vel and taken far away and\ndestroyed}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">30.&nbsp; janithri pithA cha svaputrA parAdham, sahethe\nna kim devasenAdhi nAtha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; aham chAthibAlo bhavAn loka thAtha,\nkshamasvAparAdham samastham Mahesha<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{Do not the parents\noverlook the faults of their children? Oh! Chief of the army of Devas! I am a\nsmall child. Thou art the Father of the Universe. Oh Mahesha! Forgive all my\nfaults}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">31.&nbsp; namah kekine shaktaye chApi tubhyam, namah\nchhaga tubhyam namah kukkutAya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; namah sindhave sindhu deshAya tubhyam,\npunah skanda moorthe namaste namostu<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{I bow to Thee, O\nPeacock (the symbol of Vedas)! I bow to Thee, O Shakti Weapon (Vel is\nParashakti herself), I bow to Thee, O Sheep (the symbol of maya tattvam), I bow\nto Thee, O Rooster (the symbol of Ego), I bow to Thee, O Ocean (the symbol of\nananda), I bow to Thee, O Tiruchendur Shrine, I bow to Thee, O Lord Skanda! I\nbow to Thee again and again! Let all my prostrations reach Thee!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">32.&nbsp; jayA nanda bhooman jayA pAra dhAman, jayA\nmogha keerthe jayA nanthamoorthe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; jayA nanda sindho jayA shesha bandho,\njaya tvam sadA mukti dhAnesha soono<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{O Source of ananda,\nreveal Thyself! O Embodiment of boundless effulgent light, reveal Thyself! O\nLord! who has all pervading glory, reveal Thyself! O Embodiment of bliss,\nreveal Thyself! O Lord, Thou art the ocean of bliss, reveal Thyself! O Lord who\nis the friend of all creatures, reveal Thyself! O Lord, Son of Parameshwara,\nBestower of liberation, reveal Thy Glory to me and protect me!}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">33.&nbsp; bhujangAkhya vritthena kluptham sthavam yah,\npateth bhakti yuktho guham sam pranamya<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; suputrAn kaLathram dhanam dheergamAyuh,\nlabheth Skanda sAyujya manthe narrassah.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">{That holy devotee, who\nprostrates to Lord Guha, reciting the Bhujanga stotra daily, with devotion,\nwill be blessed with good sons, good wife, wealth and long life, and at end of\nhis life, will attain eternal bliss with Lord Skanda}.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">... ... ... vElum\nmayilum thuNai .. ... ...<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-wyK_X7JWIdY/UpA3I23uP_I/AAAAAAAAn1I/XQXD4bIz6Zk/s1600/imagescfhnjmk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The sack of Somnath\ntemple in 1026 by Mahmud of Ghazni has been described by thousands of\nhistorians.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"></span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: &nbsp;The roof of the ancient\nSomnath Temple was supported by fifty-six golden pillars, ornamented with diamonds\n, rubies , sapphires and pearls.&nbsp;&nbsp; &nbsp;Several thousand gold and silver statues stood\nround the gigantic idol of Lord Shiva ( interior filled with uncut diamonds creating\na field of scalar energy )</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-k6E1WjDZaps/WLT1k90q7WI/AAAAAAABRRs/RlIk7wRizVETR5GXFpZN5uFlK-tgY-DtQCLcB/s1600/syk99es1869a.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All of them are exaggerated\nand downright lies. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4iVonA2lWog/UpA3hzXStbI/AAAAAAAAn1Y/puHvhVbwkZ8/s1600/Ruins_somnath_temple1869.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-4iVonA2lWog/UpA3hzXStbI/AAAAAAAAn1Y/puHvhVbwkZ8/s640/Ruins_somnath_temple1869.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">10 months ago, French\ntroops landed at Mali, to \u201cdefeat\u201d the Islamists.&nbsp; When I saw this on BBC&nbsp; I told my wife \u201c I am writing down on a piece\nof paper with my signature and date,&nbsp;\nthat when the smoke clears up the priceless ancient library of Mali will\nbe burnt.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lDhMZ8BZ3Z8/UpBGfKonfhI/AAAAAAAAn4A/S4m-nb3giio/s1600/burning-books1-590x393.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"266\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-lDhMZ8BZ3Z8/UpBGfKonfhI/AAAAAAAAn4A/S4m-nb3giio/s400/burning-books1-590x393.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">My wife asked me how I\nam so sure.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w-3jg7IJOno/UpBGW6UuBhI/AAAAAAAAn34/F-QT5CZ_Lc4/s1600/timbuktu-manuscripts-ap-670.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"338\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-w-3jg7IJOno/UpBGW6UuBhI/AAAAAAAAn34/F-QT5CZ_Lc4/s640/timbuktu-manuscripts-ap-670.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I said \u201c The historical\nrecords of this planet and Kerala Math, Science , Astronomy , Medicine etc lie\nunder the sands of Timbuctoo. People make fun of Timbuctoo, but this place has\na great history\u201d<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eMyHsSZRqm8/UpBGsuE4aLI/AAAAAAAAn4I/rXzfsImrcq8/s1600/imageOYGTYs.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"268\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-eMyHsSZRqm8/UpBGsuE4aLI/AAAAAAAAn4I/rXzfsImrcq8/s400/imageOYGTYs.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my prediction came\ntrue , and the priceless library was destroyed , I blogged on the subject.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The French blamed the Islamists . &nbsp;Why should Islamists burn their own history\nwith a \u201cheavy heart\u201d ?<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MANSA MUSA KING OF MALI\nAND SRI PADMANABHASWAMY TEMPLE GOLD&nbsp;\nVADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But again, let me tell\nthis world, that they got to destroy only 40%.&nbsp;&nbsp; 60\n% of ancient Kerala knowledge, still lies buried in fox holes of the\ndesert.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A lot of information\nin&nbsp; my blogs are from Timbuctoo.&nbsp;&nbsp; I have never been there as Mali is\nlandlocked, but I got a lot of information from my ship\u2019s agent at Dakar ,\nSenegal , where I got off my ship to fly home .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A big part of\ninformation is from Morocco, the land of Ibn Batuta.&nbsp;&nbsp; Chinese Admiral Zheng He who traded with the\nCalicut King and died at Calicut had written his own history.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">With every year the\nwealth in gold and diamonds stolen from Somnath temple by Mahmud of Ghazni gets\nbigger and bigger.&nbsp; It has got so big\nthat all his thousands of horses would have died of exhaustion&nbsp; It was very difficult for him to lug these\nheavy doors back to Ghazni very far away. But he did. These doors adorned his\ntomb when he dies after 4 years , on April 30, 1030 at the age of 59 years, of\nMalaria inflicted into his tent from a pot by a Hindu priest, who went as a\nguide.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; This door can still be seen in a store room\nat Agra fort.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A\nfew years later in 1857, Rothschild changed from traders to rulers , and would\nprise off the heavy golden spires off Taj Mahal and put brass duplicates in\nplace. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Days before the arrival\nof Mahmud of Ghazni, the ruler had transferred part of the wealth in Somnath\nTemple to a fortified offshore island Gundevi.&nbsp;&nbsp;\nAnother part was transported by Bhimdeva Solanki, to an\nimpenetrable&nbsp; area by horses at Mount Abu\n\u2013 the fortified castle of Achal Gadh.&nbsp;\nShips were used by sea routes via Bhadreshwar and then land route to Kanthkot\nat Kuchha, though the Pancheshwar route.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Some fixtures in gold ,\nlike the heavy gold chain for the bell and the embedded jewels of the main\nSomeshwara idol were left as it is . Thinking that the treasure was hidden in\nsome vault, Mahmud got enraged and broke open the whole temple. &nbsp;He tried his best to get information and\nkilled thousands of unarmed pilgrims inside the temple, a massacre of mad\nfrenzy.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was a sorry sight to\nsee Mahmud of Ghazni finally leave with some girls , the broken Shiva idol ( 4\npieces to be wieldy ) and the dismantled pieces of the huge sandalwood doors. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">He did\nNOT even get the magnificient Moonstone&nbsp;\ninset as Shiva\u2019s third eye on the forehead which would wax and wane in\nbrilliance along with the light of the moon, like magic , even in the dark.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So much of lies and\nexaggeration by Arab historians.&nbsp; Equally\nmatched by nationalist Hindus in India.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tall\nstories were concocted BLAH BLAH - though the idol was broken in four pieces,\nthe first piece was sent to Mecca to be placed under the entrance door of the\nKaaba. The second piece was placed under the entrance to the prophets mosque in\nMedina. The third at the entrance of the great mosque of Ghuzznih, and the last\npiece at the entrance of the royal palace in Ghuzznih (Ghazni) BLAH BLAH BLAH .<o:p></o:p></span></i><br />\n<i><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahmud Ghazni\u2019s MAIN\naim was to cart away the huge shiva lingam, the black meteorite stone. But that\nancient stone was uprooted and hidden . &nbsp;The\nShiva lingam at Somnath was so huge that part of it remained submerged under\nwater and a platform was built over.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This Shiva Lingam was\nreused later. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The doors had no value\nas India was full of huge girth sandalwood trees.&nbsp; &nbsp;Rothschild\nhad cut off all our aged sandalwood and rose wood trees. &nbsp;The best teak trees he cut and carted away for\nhis shipbuilding industry-after all he was a shipowner ( British East India\nCompany ).<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Within a few weeks the\nconstruction of a brand new Surya temple at Modhera took place, and the\ntreasures shifted here.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><i>Below : Sun temple at Modhera.</i></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-Tx8bLHCy-fc/UpBMMvrJ4aI/AAAAAAAAn4o/2hvjpQHXTCU/s1600/imaMODHERAges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em;
