, &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">THE MAIN PURPOSE MAHMUD\nOF GHAZNI CAME TO SOMNATH WAS THE BLACK SHIVA LINGAM . &nbsp;HE WAS SPECIALLY ENGAGED BY KHALIF OF BAGHDAD\nQADIR BILLAH.</b><o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original Shiva\nLingam at the Kaaba was consecrated by Muhammed the Prophet himself , taken\nfrom the ancient Shiva Temple at the Mecca Oasis .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was installed on the SE\ncorner horizontally 5 feet above the ground. Every pilgrim would kiss the\nstone.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">VEDIC PRACTISES AT\nMECCA VADAKAYIL.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Qarmatian leader Abu\nTahir al-Qarmati uprooted this black meteorite stone , heavier than steel and\nset it up in his own mosque, the Masjid al-Dirar, with the intention of\nredirecting the Hajj away from Mecca. He was successful and the Kaaba at Mecca\nlost its value, with the main attraction missing .&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After much bloodshed ,\nthe stone was returned twenty-three years later, in 952 AD, but in pieces.&nbsp; Somebody came threw a bundle and vanished.\nThis returned stone weighed very light and when put in fresh water it floated.\nSo this was just a black pumice stone with gas pockets found at high heat\nvolcanoes. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sxAprLTyW-o/UpA5tLu2BfI/AAAAAAAAn2Q/dbwLK5KhUh0/s1600/180px-Blackstone.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-sxAprLTyW-o/UpA5tLu2BfI/AAAAAAAAn2Q/dbwLK5KhUh0/s640/180px-Blackstone.jpg\" width=\"431\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was necessary to\nfind a new heavy meteorite stone as replacement. Till then these seven pieces\nof black light stones were black cemented .&nbsp;\nThis is what exists even today.&nbsp;\nThis stone has been X-Rayed by the British .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Below: Everybody wants to kiss the black stone -- &nbsp; &nbsp; guards beat devotees who take too long to kiss &nbsp;( previously with whips which flakes off flesh - &nbsp;as happened to my Pakistani&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">third</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;engineer who was rubbing dozens of silk handkerchiefs given to him by relatives and madrassa friends ) .</span></b></span><br />\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A Shiva Lingam is a\nheavy black meterorite stone which contains the seed or DNA. This has been\nproved by NASA two years ago.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Qarmatians used the\nblack Shiva Lingam for ransom, and forced the Abbasids to pay a huge sum for\nits return.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Qarmation sect that\nsplintered off from the Ismailis in the late 800s, ruled what is now Eastern\nSaudi Arabia and Bahrain.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They had\ndesecrated the well of Zamzam by stuffing it full of the bodies of dead Hajjis.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well I did NOT want to write this\u2014 but then truth is truth.&nbsp; IT took a long time before the Zan Zam water\nwas drunk again by the pilgrims .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Zamzam well is\nabout 100 feet deep and 9 feet in diameter . Originally water from the well was\ndrawn via ropes and buckets, but today the well itself is in a basement room\nwhere it can be seen behind glass panels (visitors are not allowed to enter). &nbsp;Electric pumps draw the water, which is available via water fountains and\ndispensing containers near the Tawaf area<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The original sandalwood\ndoors which gives a pleasant aroma , will probably be in one of the palaces of\nRothschild. The whole thing of snatching away a door from a Islamic mausoleum\nwas done with a lot of dram which included the Governor General of India ( a\nRothschild stooge appointee ) and the British Parliament.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Below: Rothschild must be thinking that the STAR OF DAVID belongs to him.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: purple;\">If BIG BROTHER (or his family) says he won the marathon\u2014you can be cock sure , that he ran the first 100 metres \u2013 then\ngot substituted by a fake double\u2014 got into a stretched limousine with tinted\nglasses -- </span><span style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">he relaxed, had sex, brandy and cigars</span> </span><span style=\"background-color: yellow; color: purple;\">\u2013 then re-joined the race again\nat the last 100 metres , over took the silver medalist at the last 5 metres and\nwon the prize. &nbsp;His own MONOPOLISED media\nwould then make him a SUPER DUPER HERO.</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-ok2A4MZZixQ/UpBFA7paVfI/AAAAAAAAn3k/-zFV9oqnGUQ/s1600/somnath-gate-at-agra.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b><br /></b></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b>Below: Anahata Chakra ( heart )</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YsiPod0bQ4M/UpJRnAG-B8I/AAAAAAAAn9s/sDYRwRMaaGs/s1600/downlowvervad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-YsiPod0bQ4M/UpJRnAG-B8I/AAAAAAAAn9s/sDYRwRMaaGs/s400/downlowvervad.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-style: italic; line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-phyxDQDXU-U/UpJR0K1VYDI/AAAAAAAAn90/voRaPjdiZRk/s1600/Anahatasharada.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-phyxDQDXU-U/UpJR0K1VYDI/AAAAAAAAn90/voRaPjdiZRk/s320/Anahatasharada.jpg\" width=\"310\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\"><br /></i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: cyan;\">Below: The doors forcibly taken away from the tomb of Mahud of Ghazni -- fake Somnath temple doors.</i></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oagz9COP3XY/UpA4cACkhwI/AAAAAAAAn1w/o9ABUfqbsJ8/s1600/iln1872.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-oagz9COP3XY/UpA4cACkhwI/AAAAAAAAn1w/o9ABUfqbsJ8/s1600/iln1872.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1842, Edward Law,\n1st Earl of Ellenborough issued his famous 'Proclamation of the Gates' in which\nhe ordered the British army in Afghanistan to return via Ghazni and bring back\nto India the sandalwood gates from the tomb of Mahmud of Ghazni in Ghazni,\nAfghanistan.</span> <br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: Interior of Mahmud of Ghazni's tomb.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QosySvIObQM/UpBEyO2XzEI/AAAAAAAAn3c/rMd3Ss2mEjM/s1600/rattray1848b.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"232\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-QosySvIObQM/UpBEyO2XzEI/AAAAAAAAn3c/rMd3Ss2mEjM/s320/rattray1848b.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There\nwas a mock debate in the House of Commons in London in 1843 on the question of\nthe sandalwood gates of the Somanath temple.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IcJs7w_KTWk/UpA30m5xJOI/AAAAAAAAn1g/mV7UV0Ce-bw/s1600/29-1176f9d0ff.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-IcJs7w_KTWk/UpA30m5xJOI/AAAAAAAAn1g/mV7UV0Ce-bw/s640/29-1176f9d0ff.jpg\" width=\"462\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After much cross-fire between the\nBritish Government and the opposition, &nbsp;the\ngates were uprooted and brought back in triumph, with the owner of British East India Company, Jew Rothschild smirking over\nbrandy and cigars.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TRRtIbkSB7s/UpA36wPIGWI/AAAAAAAAn1o/hBAXmaq0d4o/s1600/modplaque.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"426\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-TRRtIbkSB7s/UpA36wPIGWI/AAAAAAAAn1o/hBAXmaq0d4o/s640/modplaque.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Somnath temple is one\nof the twelve Jyotirlingas of Lord Shiva. &nbsp;The temples lies on the western coast of\nGujarat. &nbsp;This temple is as old as\ncreation itself and finds a mention in the 7000 year old Rig Veda..<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first Somnath\nJyotirling Pran-Pratistha was done on the auspicious third day of brighter half\nof Shravan month during the tenth Treta yug of Vaivswat Manvantar, as per our\nHindu scriptures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OrrWzmyJZjE/UpA_Iguh8QI/AAAAAAAAn3E/L2aprF-uXtE/s1600/9-8019b06161.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OrrWzmyJZjE/UpA_Iguh8QI/AAAAAAAAn3E/L2aprF-uXtE/s640/9-8019b06161.jpg\" width=\"556\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<b>The Dwadasa\nJyotirlinga Stotra:-<o:p></o:p></b></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Saurashtre Somanaatham\nCha<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Sree Shaile\nMallikarjunam<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Ujjayinyaam\nMahaakaalam<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Omkaare Mamaleswaram<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Himalaye to Kedaram<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Daakinyaam\nBhimashankaram<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Vaaranaasyaam cha\nViswesam<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Trayambakam\nGowtameethate<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Paralyaam\nVaidyanaatham cha<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Naagesam Daarukaavane<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Setubandhe Ramesham</i></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<i>Grushnesam cha\nShivaalaye<o:p></o:p></i></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Somnath temple was\nattacked 6 times in history by jealous Muslim invaders. The temple was rebuilt\nevery time with the people.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then after Aurangazeb\ndestroyed the temple in 1701, a mosque came up exactly in the same spot, using\nthe same stones, with Hindu motifs visible -- just like Babri Masjid in\nAyodhya.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The modern temple was\nreconstructed with the resolve of Sardar Vallabhai Patel who visited the ruins\nof Somnath temple on November 13 , 1947.&nbsp;&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Then President of\nIndia, Dr. Rajendra Prasad, did the Pran-Pratistha at the existing temple on 11\nMay 1951 despite reservations voiced by \u201csecular\u201d Nehru--about razing down the\nmosque , and chasing the hardcore mullahs away..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: purple;\">Nehru knew very well that 90 million Hindus were killed by invaders and thousands of Hindu temples more grand than Somnath were razed to the ground, yet he wanted to be SECULAR..</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">Punch into Google\nsearch\u2014 prepared to be shocked.</span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>THE UNQUANTIFIED\nHOLOCAUST AND GENOCIDE VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-emCpfy0DLlY/UpBIlhvd9tI/AAAAAAAAn4U/1AK8uY0a7Tk/s1600/somnath.png\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-emCpfy0DLlY/UpBIlhvd9tI/AAAAAAAAn4U/1AK8uY0a7Tk/s1600/somnath.png\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<i><span style=\"color: red;\">Above: What do you call a mosque within a temple?</span></i><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In&nbsp; the Shiva&nbsp;\nPurana&nbsp; and Nandi&nbsp; Upapurana, Shiva&nbsp; said, `I&nbsp;\nam&nbsp; always present everywhere&nbsp; but&nbsp;\nspecially&nbsp; in&nbsp; 12&nbsp;\nforms&nbsp; and places as&nbsp; the&nbsp;\njyotirlingas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The&nbsp; shore&nbsp;\ntemple of Somnath is&nbsp;\nbelieved&nbsp; to&nbsp; have&nbsp;\nbeen&nbsp; built&nbsp; in&nbsp;\n4&nbsp; phases-in&nbsp; gold&nbsp;\nby&nbsp; Lord Soma,&nbsp; in&nbsp;\nsilver&nbsp; by&nbsp; Ravi,&nbsp;\nin wood&nbsp; by&nbsp; lord&nbsp;\nKrishna&nbsp; and&nbsp; in&nbsp;\nstone&nbsp; by&nbsp; King Bhimadeva.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my ship had\nberthed at Veraval, Gujarat, &nbsp;I had\nvisited Somnath temple at Prabhas Patan .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mzsmA-sdHf0/UpBL6LNCL9I/AAAAAAAAn4g/edsOd9kSRg8/s1600/Somnath-temple+(1).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-mzsmA-sdHf0/UpBL6LNCL9I/AAAAAAAAn4g/edsOd9kSRg8/s640/Somnath-temple+(1).jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The grandeur of Somnath\nwas described by Al Biruni who was an Arab traveler. &nbsp;He wrote about priceless diamonds shining in\ndarkness. &nbsp;Ancient Indians were the\nmasters of Total Internal Reflection written down in our Vedic texts 7000 years\nago.. explaining critical angle and refractive index.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Till the white man\ndiscovered diamonds in South Africa in 1886, diamonds were available only in\nIndia.&nbsp; In 1726 the white man had found\nsome\" low quality\" diamonds on a Brazilian river bed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The next\ndiscovery was in 1906 in Congo. Alexander the Great , when he came to India in\n326 BC, had talked about Indian noblemen wearing Navratna rings and the women\nwearing Navratna lockets. Navratna literally means 9 gems. Out of this Venus\nwas represented by a brilliantly cut (Hira) Diamond. Mercury was Green (Panna)\nEmerald and Blue Sapphire was (Indraneelam) Saturn.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sM8OetJVSzY/UpBNcyueh9I/AAAAAAAAn5I/CmGaWoC6-xM/s1600/tttt.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-sM8OetJVSzY/UpBNcyueh9I/AAAAAAAAn5I/CmGaWoC6-xM/s1600/tttt.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The West came to know about\nIndian diamonds as early as 3000 years ago, when King Solomon imported diamonds\nvia ships going from Kerala.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">RATNA PARIKSHA was a 5000 year old Sanskrit text\non optics which dealt with critical angles, high refractive index of diamond (\n2.4 ) and low critical angle ( 24 deg ) and&nbsp;\ntotal internal reflection physics and the art of cutting diamonds, to\nmake it spit fire. It clearly states that only diamond can cut diamond, hence\npolishing must be done with diamond , and that if a diamond is cut poorly it\nwill NOT sparkle.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our 4000 year old Indian temples had pin hole cameras which\ncould give inverted pictures and the coloured prism. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">Indian diamond cutters are so reliable that even today in 2011 that nearly 1.45 million cutters still cut 13 out of 14 diamonds world wide(</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 16.363636016845703px;\">93.5% by numbers cut )--despite the inroads of computer controlled laser cutting technology..</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back-- Al\nBaruni wrote about 1000 priests doing pooja and rituals in Somnath temple, 300\nmusicians and 500 attractive dancing girls in shifts , round the clock and 300\nbarbers to tonsure pilgrims' heads.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Skanda Purana\ndescribes the Sparsa Linga of Somnath as one bright as the sun, the size of an\negg, lodged underground. &nbsp;The 6000 year\nold Mahabharatha refers to the Prabhasa Kshetra and the legend of the moon\nworshipping Shiva. Our scriptures talk about the huge bell plate with a heavy golden\nchain .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Going against the\nwishes of the hugely Hindu majority population, the Nawab of Junagadh refused\nto accede his princely state to newly independent India in 1947. &nbsp;&nbsp;This\nled to bloody clashes and finally after the Indian Government intervened, Junagadh\nbecame a part of India. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Deputy Prime\nMinister, Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel had come to Junagadh on 12th November 1947\nto direct the stabilization of the princely state by the Indian Army and at the\nsame time ordered the reconstruction of the Somnath Temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Addressing a mammoth\ngathering before the Somnath temple, Patel said: \"On this auspicious day\nof the New Year, we have decided that Somanath should be reconstructed. You,\npeople of Saurashtra, should do your best. This is a holy task in which all\nshould participate\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Below: Patel's statue near Somnath.</span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-2_MVTISRKRg/UpBQnxwpWSI/AAAAAAAAn5U/3S2x2Y7sJBI/s1600/patelphoto.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In May 1951, Dr.\nRajendra Prasad, the first President of Free India performed the installation\nceremony for the temple by over-ruling the mindless opposition of Prime\nMinister Jawaharlal Nehru to his participation in the ceremony, to appease\nMuslims. &nbsp;Prasad said \"The Somnath\ntemple signifies that the power of reconstruction is always greater than the\npower of destruction\".&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is no landmass if\nyou look south from Somnath Temple door - till Antartica, as per an inscription\nin Sanskrit engraved in stone on the Arrow-Pillar called Baan-Stambh erected on\nthe sea-protection wall at the Somnath Temple.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-prQsgKIbSVM/UpB_yJ61yMI/AAAAAAAAn6c/LlBGPJCXHtE/s1600/downlkhbdrgoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must know that\nAntartica remained undiscovered until 1818 CE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The temple faces to\neast and once had an enormous central hall with three entrances, each protected\nby a lofty porch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J1j0beGQINY/UpB_4tBIToI/AAAAAAAAn6k/on9KjReRQZ4/s1600/556068704_c27bc1dd60_o.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"536\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-J1j0beGQINY/UpB_4tBIToI/AAAAAAAAn6k/on9KjReRQZ4/s640/556068704_c27bc1dd60_o.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large parts of\nAntarctica could have remained ice-free until 4000 BC.&nbsp; Antarctica was not always covered with ice\nand was, at one time, much warmer than it is today.&nbsp; It was warm because it was not physically\nlocated at the South Pole in that period.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Piri Reis map drawn\non deer skin is copied from more than 6000 year old indian maps.. This 1513 map\nis shocking NOT because of the inclusion of a continent that was not discovered\nuntil 1818 , but rather its portrayal of part of the coastline of that\ncontinent under ice-free conditions that came to an end 6,000 years ago and\nthat have not since recurred.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/TS4eDmhkj8M/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/TS4eDmhkj8M&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/TS4eDmhkj8M&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">India was the only known civilization at that\ntime.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the olden days\nKerala ships delivered spices to Salalah , Aden , Bernice and from there it\nwent by caravan route to Cairo and Constantinople.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mecca was just an oasis\nand an accounts office of the calicut king, which also doubled up as a shiva\ntemple with a shiva lingam stone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The vulgar west fudged\nall history to prove that the bible was right in stating that the big banh\noccured in 4004 BC.&nbsp; While i have been\nstating in most of my posts that before 7000 BC India ruled the whole world.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only 35% of this map\nsurvives and it shows the western coasts of Europe and North Africa and the\ncoast of Brazil with reasonable accuracy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The map was discovered\nby chance in 1929, through the work of the German Jew theologian, Gustav Adolf\nDeissmann (1866\u20131937) .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1501 an admiral in\nthe Ottoman navy named Kemal Reis captured seven Spanish ships off the coast of\nSpain, near Valencia. Aboard one of the prizes he found a strange feather head\ndress and a heavy black meterorite shiva lingam stone.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The US Navy even\ninvestigated this map and validated it as being not a forgery, and so did\nAlbert Einstein.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Ottoman Admiral Piri\nReis could not have acquired his information on this latter region from\ncontemporary explorers because Antarctica remained undiscovered until 1818 CE,\nmore than 300 years after he drew the map. poor guy was beheaded.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Large parts of\nAntarctica could have remained ice-free until 4000 BC. &nbsp;Antarctica was not always covered with ice and\nwas, at one time, much warmer than it is today. &nbsp;It was warm because it was not physically\nlocated at the South Pole in that period. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead it stood\napproximately several hundred miles further to the north in ice free ocean. the\ncontinent moved to its present position inside the Antarctic Circle as a result\nof a mechanism known as earth-crust-displacement-- which Albert Einstein has\nexplained well.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gx59Se2zv34/UpB_h6HDUwI/AAAAAAAAn6U/2t3uYtQOvPo/s1600/piri-reis-map-antarctica-300x240.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gx59Se2zv34/UpB_h6HDUwI/AAAAAAAAn6U/2t3uYtQOvPo/s400/piri-reis-map-antarctica-300x240.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The map also shows the\nAndes Mountains on the western side of the &nbsp;S America continent, which were of course\nunknown at the time. &nbsp;The map correctly\nshows the Amazon River rising in these unexplored mountains and thence flowing\neastward. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although they remained\nundiscovered until 1592 AD, the Falkland Islands appear on the 1513 map at\ntheir correct latitude.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Back to Somnath temple-</span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Maitraka Kings of\nVallabhi in Gujarat renovated the Somnath temple in 649 AD..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 725AD Junayad, the\nArab governor of Sind, destroyed this temple ( 1)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">King Nagabhata II of\nthe Gurjara Pratihara dynasty re-built the temple in 815 AD in a large lavish\nmanner with red sandstone<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1026AD, Mahmud\nGhazni destroyed Somnath temple.(2)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It was rebuilt by Solanki King\nBhima of Ahnilwara Gujarat and Parmara King Bhoja of Malwa. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">During his campaign,\nMahmud was challenged by 90 year old Ghogha Rana 90, sacrificed himself and the\nsoldiers of his clan fighting against this Islamic warrior. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Somnath temple was\nraided by Alaf Khan&nbsp; the general&nbsp; by Sultan Allauddin Khilji in 1300 A.D\n(3).&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mahipala Deva of the Chudasama\ndynasty of Saurashtra renovated it.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1375 AD, the temple\nwas again destroyed by Muzaffar Shah I (4)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The temple was again\nreconstructed, by Mahipal, the king of Junagadh.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1451, the temple was\nonce again destroyed by Mahmud Begda, the Sultan of Gujarat. (5)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later, the Marathas\nrulers of Pune, Nagpur, Kolhapur and Indore came together and rebuilt the\ntemple. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The last destruction of\nSomnath was by the last Mughal Emperor Aurangzeb in 1706 AD,( 6)&nbsp; just a year before his death.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aurangzeb built\na mosque on the site of the Somnath temple, using some columns from the temple,\nwhose Hindu sculptural motifs remained visible.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Somnath Temple was\nrebuilt with perseverance each time after it was destroyed.&nbsp; In the year 1783 AD, Queen Ahilyabhai Holkar\nbuilt a new temple nearby as Somnath temple was converted into a mosque.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-KwSTd5xTil8/UpEPsWqZN6I/AAAAAAAAn7o/quIGXAHG6Ik/s1600/downlokygtad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; QUOTE \u201c<i>When\nthe king asked his ompanions what they had to say about the marvel of the idol,\nand of its staying in the air without prop or support, several maintained that\nit was upheld by some hidden support. The king directed a person to go and feel\nall around and above and below it with a spear, which he did, but met with no\nobstacle. One of the attendants then stated his opinion that the canopy was\nmade of loadstone, and the idol of iron, and that the ingenious builder had\nskillfully contrived that the magnet should not exercise a greater force on\nanyone side-hence the idol was suspended in the middle. Some coincided, others\ndiffered. Permission was obtained from the Sultan to remove some stones from\nthe top of the canopy to settle the point. When two stones were removed from\nthe summit the idol swerved on one side, when more were taken away it inclined\nstill further, until at last it rested on the ground\u2014BLAH BLAH BLAH</i> .\u201dUNQUOTE <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">People worship in this\nsmaller Somnath temple built by Maharani Holkar , ( after Emperor Aurangazeb\ndestroyed it ) and can be seen performing puja here. &nbsp;It is known as old Somnath\ntemple and it is also managed by Shri Somnath Trust. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: lime;\">Triveni Ghat</span><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"> in Somanth\nis the confluence of three holy rivers Kapil, Hiran and the underground river\nSaraswaty (also known as Gupt Saraswati). &nbsp;</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><br /></span></b></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; The moon has a width of 25 yojanas\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">1 Yojana is 140 kms ( this distance is modern linear - NOT the energy spiral time/ distance path which is mentioned in all our Puranas ). &nbsp;In reality everything on this cosmos from Macro to Micro &nbsp;&nbsp;is &nbsp;spiral energy .<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">In linear time Prakritti (manifest creation) came forth from the Purusha (the absolute beyond anything created). It is a point from which all came into being. In non-linear time, this point is always present where the \u2018nothing\u2019 and the \u2018something\u2019 connect beyond words. This space is 108.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Yojana/ Yugas &nbsp;has been poison injected by the white invader to make Hindus look stupid. &nbsp;BR Ambedkar was given a list of poison injectd spots in our Vedas / Upanishads/ Puranas and he wrote a book ( Riddles in Hindusim ) as if he is a great Vedic Pandit who knows Sanskrit and who has read all our ancient scriptures.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">When you look at the Sun and the Moon from earth they are perceived as the SAME size, this same size appears because of their distance and diameters.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">The 108 division is the coming together of Purusha and Prakriti. It is the vibration of the Purusha and Prakriti that has put us into existence.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">In Ayurveda there are a 108 marmas in the body. They are points where consciousness impinges the body that can heal or kill a living being.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">They are vital points where consciousness connects to the body, where Purusha (consciousness) is brought into Prakriti (body) to give life to the living being. When we recite Sanskrit Mantras &nbsp;108 times it acts as a Kavach (protection) to each Marma.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">In Sri Yantra there are 9 interlacing triangles, 5 point downwards and 4 point upwards.&nbsp; The great pyramid of Cheops Egypt has a base angle 51 deg 49 minutes like the 10000 year old Sri Yantra large pyramid, showing exactly the same relationship between pi and phi .&nbsp;</span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">The ratio of the hypotenuse to half the base is phi, the Golden Ratio-- or 'divine proportion', given by (1 + square-root 5)/2 (its value to five decimal places is 1.61803). It is a sure indication that the Pharaoh's architects were NOT from Egypt.<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\"><br /></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">The 3 lines intersect at 54 points ( number of sanskrit alphabets ) with shiva and shakti qualities making the magic number 108..<o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 26.3999996185303px;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: medium;\">Numerologically, nine is a very special number, it always returns to itself. font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In Dvaita Hinduism opposite poles Tamas and Rajas are conscious of each other. Tamas creates Rajas, and Rajas activates/ excites Tamas. Sattva preserves and mediates .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">7000 year old Vedas say that the only constant in the cosmos is change, everything is in a state of flux, nothing is static-- everything is vibratory. This is what guarantees growth and evolution. It is a cosmic spiraling dance of separate opposing forces, which sustains this universe<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">One cannot exist without the other and they are dependant . No phenomenon in this universe is completely devoid of its opposite. They consume each other yet support each other.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED TO 2-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">CONTINUED FROM 1-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">If the restraining balance or equilibrium is lost by the mediator ( Vishnu ) , the universe will spiral out of control and end. This is why Lord Vishnu is called the PRESERVER god. And only Vishnu can have mortal avatars.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">As for the opposing forces TAMAS/ RAJAS ( Brahma/ Shiva ) it really does NOT matter as who is who, like in AC electricity-where you can plug into the socket both ways.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">These two opposing forces are natural and transform each other , in perfect harmony. Harmony can never be stagnant . Lessening of Tamas always results in increase of Rajas and vice versa.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Balance can never be permanent\u2014 Tamas and Rajas continiously devour each other \u2013 and life flows on. This universe cannot exist without vibrations between two poles.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">THE THIRD TEMPLATE IS SAMKHYA<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">This is about the male and female joint TEAM effort. This is NOT a dance of opposites. In Hinduism we call the MALE- purusha and FEMALE- prakriti.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">In the Tantric cosmology, the whole universe is perceived as being created, penetrated and sustained by two fundamental forces, which are permanently in a perfect, indestructible UNION. These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti (Prakriti ).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Each of the trinity gods are powerless without their consorts.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Both Shiva and Shakti are Consciousness---- Shiva is the changeless static aspect of Consciousness, and Shakti is the kinetic, active aspect of the same Consciousness.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side sex as figured out by small minds)<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Pragati symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The cosmos in all its manifestations, as an act of love. The relationship between say- Shakti and Shiva is the dance of consciousness and energy<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Prakriti cannot be perceived, not because of its non-existence, but because of its subtlety. It is perceived in its effects.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation. This is for the perceptive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; line-height: 24px;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: white; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;, times, freeserif, serif; font-size: 16px; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 24px;\">Samkhya as you can see was a masterpiece of modeling the ways of the inner universe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"background-color: #cccccc;
