These forces or universal aspects are called Shiva ( Purusha ) and Shakti ( Prakriti) ..<br />\n<br />\nThe concept of Ardhanarishvara clearly brings out the fact that Prakriti (Shakti) and Purusha (Shiva) are nothing without each other and one cannot exist and function in the absence of the other...<br />\n<br />\nPurusha and Pragati is expressed as Shiva and Shakti in the same body 50:50 \u2013 this is NOT a she boy or a transgender . It is a mindboggling, intelligent concept\u2026<br />\n<br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"comment-content\" id=\"bc_0_132MC\" style=\"margin-bottom: 8px; text-align: justify;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">MIND YOU --SHIVA AND HIS CONSORT SHAKTI ( PARVATI/ DEVI/ KALI/ DURGA ) ARE COSMIC ALLEGORIES...</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Purusha is the embodiment of pure consciousness, and Prakriti is the embodiment of pure energy. Through uniting with Purusha , Pragati gave form to his spirit and created the universe.(we are talking about CREATION OF THE COSMOS here- not street side anal sex as figured out by small minds)\u2026</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">When the insentient Prakriti comes in contact with the sentient Purusha , the universe evolves..</span></div>\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Purusha symbolizes consciousness, the masculine principle. Prakriti symbolizes the feminine principle, the activating energy. ..</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The eternal and indestructible union between Shiva and Shakti gives birth to the whole Macrocosm, in its stable, static aspect as well as in its dynamic one. ..</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">Not only is Shakti responsible for creation, it is also the agent of all change.Shakti is manifested by Shiva only during creation and is withdrawn into himself at the end of creation..</span><br />\n<br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">Modern science repeats from our Vedas that matter and energy are interchangeable. So does consciousness and energy .</span><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">In the highest planes they are interchangeable, which is why we see a great incongruence between our spiritual experiences and the external reality.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif;\">The union of Shakti with Shiva by Kundalini rise is the liberation of seeker from the cycle of endless birth and death\u2026</span><br />\n<div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;times&quot; , &quot;freeserif&quot; , serif; font-size: large;\"><span style=\"color: red;\">WE THE PEOPLE WILL NOT ALLOW SHIVA TO BE DENIGRATED BY&nbsp;</span><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">DEEP STATE JUDGES</span></b><span style=\"color: red;\">&nbsp;AND LAWYERS IN THE PAYROLL OF FOREIGN FORCES ANYMORE\u2026</span></span><br />\n<div style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">\n<b style=\"color: magenta; font-size: xx-large;\">FOREIGN FUNDED CULTURAL TERRORISM SHALL STOP .. font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Here is info from one of\nmy crews who has attended it for 3 years.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Preaching and Bible\nstudy occupy the major part of the convention programme. &nbsp;In the morning there will be separate Bible\nstudy classes for men, women, youth and children conducted by specially invited\nleaders. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the mornings and\nafternoons there are public meetings and in the evening, meetings for men. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Four of the afternoon\npublic meetings are for \u2018\u2019Social evils awareness\u201d which is pagan religion Hindu\nbashing\u2014they will NOT dare to abuse Islam or Sikhism or whatever. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Social evil is Hindu culture.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These people who attend\nthis convention ridicule the \u201csuperstitious \u201c Hindus, for worshipping snakes .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When the airport comes\nup the runway goes over a 6000 year old Snake temple.&nbsp; 100 years ago, Kerala had 30000 Snake\ntemples. &nbsp;Today less than 5000 are left. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Usually a Hindu will\nnever build his house in an area which had a snake temple. &nbsp;So usually this land was sold to Muslims and\nChristians. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These snake temple\nlands were left alone. Nobody went that side for thousands of years, even to\ncollect firewood. &nbsp;When people wanted\nrare herbs they kept a piece of Kayam/ Hing/ Asafoetida in their pockets ,\ncollected the stuff in the daylight and came out in a jiffy. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The ground is fungus\nladen and full of rare ferns. &nbsp;Snakes of\nKerala do NOT bite you unless you step on them or corner them. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So these green pockets all over Kerala,\nusually with a water body or pond,&nbsp; has\nthe richest of flora and Ayurvedic herbs. <o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\">In his book\n\"Armies Of God: A Study In Militant Christianity\", British-born,&nbsp; academic Iain Buchanan has criticized K.P.\nYohannan for welcoming the Tsunami in 2004 by terming it as \"</span><span style=\"color: red;\"><i>one of the\ngreatest opportunities God has given us to share His love with people</i></span><span style=\"color: blue;\">\". &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nwestern evangelist world were indeed dismayed , and according to Iain Buchanan \u201csuch\nevangelicals thrive on suffering and disaster\u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an interview,\nYohannan said his 14,500 \"native missionaries\" are giving survivors\nBibles and booklets to the Tsunami survivors about about \"how to find hope\nin this time through the word of God.\" &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What do you call people\nwho take opportunistic advantage of human misery ?&nbsp; What do you call people who set YESUNAMA\npre-conditions for disaster relief ?&nbsp;\nHave you seen pedophiles giving lollipops to innocent young boys and\ngirls.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xVSfiL15lM8/Uo1kvI-TeAI/AAAAAAAAnxA/m0gX2mutvQM/s1600/dodgnm,lwnload.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rothschild has always\nused the Syrian Christian run vernacular media to their advantage before\nIndependence. &nbsp;Edwina Mountbatten had recommended MO\nMathai, a Syrian Christian as his assistant for the PMO\u2014though he was trained\nin the US military in spying.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">MO Mathai was charged\nwith spying and dismissed by Nehru himself in 1959 after serving for 13 years. .\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Katherine Frank , THE American\nbiographer refers to the controversial SHE chapter which MO Mathai apparently\nwrote for his autobiography, Reminiscences of the Nehru Age, but withdrew it\nbefore the book went to press, as there were NO accepters. &nbsp;The purported She chapter is available on the\nwebsite www.swordoftruth.com. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;;\"><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">On page 153, which is\nChapter 29, the publisher's note says, \"This chapter on an intensely\npersonal experience of the author's, written without inhibition in the D.H.\nLawrence style, has been withdrawn by the author at the last moment.\" &nbsp;The entry is dated November 1, 1977. &nbsp; MO Mathai apparently talks about Indira Gandhi\naborting their love child-- are we to&nbsp;</span></span><span style=\"line-height: 24px;\">believe</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;this spy ?.<o:p></o:p></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala state just\nproduces 10% of her food needs. &nbsp;Yet 80%\nof the 500 acres earmarked for the project were paddy fields. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The 350 acre part of the paddy field was\noriginally owned by K.J. Abraham of Kozhencherry , the Chairman of the\nPathanamthitta based evangelist Mount Zion Group ( Mount Zion is in Paletine ) .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was facing legal action for\npossession of land far exceeding the 15-acre limit prescribed by the Kerala\nLand Reforms Act. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hindu temples have been deprived of their land long back, but the Christians can hold large tracts of estates -- most of them handed over by Rothschild to their Syrian Christian benami Indian fronts when they left India after Independence..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Airport project is\nbeing promoted by the Christian KGS Group. &nbsp;Reliance Anil Ambani Group,&nbsp; has a 15 per cent stake in the group's\nflagship company. &nbsp;On 14 February 2013,\nKerala chief minister Oommen Chandy justified the state\ngovernment's decision to pick up a 10% equity in the project. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You must know that the first Maramon convention\nwas held for 10 days from 8 to 17 March 1895, and was arranged by Rothschild ,\na Jew. The venue was the vast sand-bed of the Pampa River next to the Maramon\nchurch.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Conversion of a portion\nof the 3,500-acre paddy field without an intelligent study , would &nbsp;impact on the remaining wetlands, disturb the\nfood chain, and accelerate the depletion of fish resources as well as other\nflora and fauna in the Pamba river basin.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All this is when an\nexpert team has identified and declared &nbsp;Aranmula\nas a heritage village by the United Nations Development Programme.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Aranmula airport runway\nis being constructed over the Kozhithode canal, which empties into the river\nPampa at Edayaranmula. &nbsp;This stream is a\nmajor water source for the agricultural lands in Aranmula and nearby villages. &nbsp;This stream replenished the groundwater .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole area is an ecologically\nfragile region of wetlands that feed the holy river Pampa. Several species of\nfish migrate upstream from the river through the canals to the water-logged\npaddy fields.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Reclamation of these wetlands would deprive\nthe fish of their breeding grounds. Once an airport comes here the whole area\nwill be urbanized and full of plastic waste.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pamba river is\nconsidered as the Dakshina Ganga (Southern Ganges) and is &nbsp;associated &nbsp;with the world\u2019s largest pilgrimage centre &nbsp;Sabarimala. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pilgrims take a bath in the river. Pampa\noriginates at Pulachimalai hill in the Peerumedu plateau in the Western Ghats\nat an altitude of 1650 metres and flows downhill and finally empties into the\nVembanad Lake.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are we allowing the\npaddy lands and wetlands ( <span style=\"color: blue;\">to prevent floods </span>) to be&nbsp;\nconverted, nullifying the Kerala Paddy land and Wetlands Conservation\nAct, 2008.&nbsp; Is this some national\nemergency or for security of the nation ?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">Why are we shivering and palpitating over tourism ? Are the foreigners more&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 24.545454025268555px;\">important than the natives&nbsp;</span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">?</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Kerala was the first in the country\nto bring out such an act to save its dwindling wetlands and fertile paddy\nfields. &nbsp;Kerala must be self sufficient\nin food. &nbsp;Today India is a proud country\nas we are self sufficient in food.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Aranmula\nParthasarathi Temple, one of the most ancient temples of India will never know\nany peace after this airport comes up. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The distance to\nAranmula from both the Trivandrum International Airport and the Cochin international\nAirport is just 96 km air distance. &nbsp;The\nGovernment must ponder if Kerala requires a 5th Airport - the private one\nproposed in Aranmula. &nbsp;As it is today,\nthe State will have one airport at an interval of 150 km when the Kannur\nairport is commissioned.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Kerala Government must\nrealize the importance of &nbsp;agriculture\nand fish culture. &nbsp;Wetlands formed over\nthousands of years serve to control flash floods ( like the one at Kedrnath ) ,\nto nourishing the fish ponds and drinking water wells . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>When St Thomas died in\n72 AD in Kerala ( Tamils contest this as Mylapore ), the word CHRISTIAN had NOT\nbeen formed at Antioch by martyred Ignatius. &nbsp;The seat of the patriarchate was formerly\nAntioch, which is now in Turkey.&nbsp; </b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; The Roman Catholic Church\nalso claimed the patriarchate and appointed titular Latin rite patriarchs for\nmany centuries until it renounced those claims in 1964, for good.&nbsp; &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\"><b>Antioch was the capital\nof Syria before Christ was born. &nbsp;Antioch\nwas a chief center of early Christianity. The city had a large population of Namboodiri\ndescendants and Hindus in a Jewish origin in a quarter called the Kerateion.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: large; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow;\">&nbsp;The Jews who were converted by St. Thomas , continued\nworshiping in synagogues</span>. &nbsp;</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In fact when\nSt Thomas arrives at Kondungallur, &nbsp;he heard\na Jewish tune being played on a flute on the quay.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A protest took place in\n1653 with the Coonan Cross Oath. Under the leadership of Archdeacon Thomas, the\nSyrian Christians Christians publicly took an oath that they would not obey the\nVatican Jesuit bishops.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In 1655, the Syrian\nChristians feeling the pressure from the white invader summoned to Kerala , Mar\nGregorios Abdul Jaleel , a Bishop (&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">the patriarch of\nJerusalem)&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">sent by the Syriac Orthodox Patriarch of Antioch. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">For the first time in\n1655 the Syrian Christian Church leader was given the title Mar Thoma. The\npresent head of the Mar Thoma Church is the twenty first Mar Thoma.</span><br />\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now let us talk about\nthe fair skinned Christians with light eyes. &nbsp;In 370 AD, a group of 420 immigrants from Persia arrived in Kodungallur by ship under\nthe leadership of a merchant Knai Thomman. &nbsp;You must know that the Parsi Zoroastrians are\nHindus who worshipped Shukracharya.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">SHUKRACHARYA IS AHURA\nMAZDA GOD OF THE PARSIS, INDIAN PROPHET ZOROASTER WROTE ZEND AVESTA VADAKAYIL<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They were allowed by\nthe Calicut King to settle down in Kodungallur. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later on another\nimmigration from Persia occurred around 820 AD under the leadership of a\nmerchant Marwan Sabriso, with two Bishops, Mar Sapro and Mar Prodh. &nbsp;Together they were known as Knanaya (Kanahi ) people.\n&nbsp;They continued to remain an endogamous\ngroup within the Nasrani community. They cooperated with the Malankara Church,\nattended worship services together but remained a separate identity. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">By the 10th century, in Malabar there were two\nNazrani groups, the St. Thomas Christians and Knanaya community. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>St Paul\u2019s Cathedral is built over the\nfoundation of an ancient &nbsp;Shiva Temple,\nand the Shiva Lingam or the black meteorite stone still lies in the Vatican\nvaults.&nbsp;</i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><br /></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pR6lJMXu0rU/Uo61T4DlqiI/AAAAAAAAnzc/M0Il9o3YiZ8/s1600/imehrfages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-pR6lJMXu0rU/Uo61T4DlqiI/AAAAAAAAnzc/M0Il9o3YiZ8/s640/imehrfages.jpg\" width=\"332\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Xavier gave up and then started converting Hindus by force. The Tamil\nChristians uprooted the plaque at Vivekananda memorial rock, and planted a\ncross there recently. They claimed that it was NOT Vivekananda, but Francis\nXavier who meditated there. TEE HEEEE ! &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">These are the ones who were at the front of the Kudamkulam nuclear protests, and the king pins of the mother of all scams THE THORIUM SCAM\u2014which is NOT yet unearthed.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12pt;\">The foreign funded Indian media had given 90% time for Sachin Tendulkar for nearly a week. , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The current religion\nfigures of Kerala are - &nbsp;51% Hindus, 26% &nbsp;Muslims, 22% &nbsp;Christians.&nbsp;\nThe white man does NOT care for Christianity anymore, and most of them\nprefer to be cremated.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Getting back - &nbsp;after a lengthy digression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The whole Aranmula area\nis full of multicolored birds. &nbsp;&nbsp;When I open the doors of my home at Calicut, &nbsp;just before sunrise , &nbsp;the whole area is full of hundreds of multicolored\nbirds. &nbsp;With untrained and pea brained and\ncorrupt environmentalists around Kerala, god alone knows for how long.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The town Maramon is\ngenerally recognized as center of Christian culture and influence in India.\nMaramon is also famous as the birthplace of 'Palakkunnathu' Abraham Malpan\n(Malpan means teacher), leader of the reformation in the Syrian Church of\nMalabar in the 19th century.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Before the\nenvironmental clearance was obtained , mindless damage was done to the ecology\n, by illegal filling of water streams,&nbsp;\nwetlands and paddy fields \u2013&nbsp; while\nblocking some of the major tributaries of the river Pampa.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Pamba River (also\ncalled Pampa river) is the third longest river in the South Indian state of\nKerala after Periyar and Bharathappuzha.&nbsp;\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wetlands adjacent\nto the river Pamba,&nbsp; serve as natural\nflood control in the area whenever the river Pamba overflows, reducing the\nimpacts of flood on the local population and their lives considerably.&nbsp; The wetlands act as ground for egg laying,\nhatchery and nursery. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Due to the airport very\nsoon&nbsp; we will lose a major river, by way\nof siltation with flood disasters year after year.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; A hole is made in the roof of the Mandapa where the line of the above angle touches the roof.<br />\n<br />\nThe middle point between the eyebrows of the idol, the hole in the roof and the top of the Dhwaja is in the same line.<br />\n<br />\nThe above angle line when extended should reach the top of the Kalasa the Gali-Gopuram. The Gali-Gopuram should be constructed at thr right distance.<br />\n<br />\nAs the earth axis is tilted to an angle of 23.4 degrees the small hole, the top of the Dhwaja and the top of the Gali-Gopuram should be in a line making an angle of 23.4 degrees with the normal sight line of the idol for the optimum powerful radiation of the directional power.<br />\n<br />\nA TEMPLE STUMBHA IS A QUARTER LAMBDA ANTENNA --NOT FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC WAVES BUT FOR SCALAR WAVES --HOWEVER IT FULLFILLS CONDITIONS FOR ELECTROMAGNETIC SPECTRUM.<br />\n<br />\nEVERY STAMBHA IN ANCIENT TIMES HAS IRRIDIUM AND RHODIUM INHERENT IN THE VAHANA FIGURE OF THE DEITY RIGHT ON TOP. VAHANA MEANS CARRIER ( WAVE ).<br />\n<br />\nToday any incoming missile is shot down in seconds using circular arrays are composed of thousands of crossed dipole antennas.<br />\n<br />\nThe impedance of a 1/4 lambda Marconi antenna is 36.6 ohms.A \u00bd lambda dipole has an impedance of about 70 ohms . font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Americans think\nthat their F22 stealth Raptor is the best .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This SU-35 can whip any\nUS fighter , including the Lockheed Martin's F-35 Lightning II and F-22 Raptor.</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Su-35 &nbsp;is equipped with an infra-red search and track\nsystem that could detect stealth aircraft within a range of more than 80 km .&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below: SU-35 pilot ejecting.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Stealth is for RADAR -- not for IR, w</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">hich is sensitive\nenough to detect the heat of a jet from head-on as well, either infra-red\nenergy generated from the hot air coming out of the engines, from air friction\nheating the airframe, or both</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Astonished experts at\nthe Paris airshow dubbed the awesome Su-35, the \"UFO\" for its\noutstanding maneuverability.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gS24fBvOLZI/UoxbaF_EAxI/AAAAAAAAnuA/N86YgNgW5TU/s1600/downlgc+oad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The fighter jet\nperformed all kinds of stunts, including Pugachev's Cobra, the Frolov Chakra,\nthe Dead Leaf, and the unprecedented Pancake, which is an horizontal 360-degree\nmade turn without losing speed.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\">BELOW: &nbsp; SU-35 WITH NUCLEAR STRIKE CAPABILITY.</span></b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: red;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QmBDyr2UqIU/UopbpzDwAmI/AAAAAAAAntc/qE8V-AH4BNs/s1600/Su-35-Wallpaper.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-QmBDyr2UqIU/UopbpzDwAmI/AAAAAAAAntc/qE8V-AH4BNs/s640/Su-35-Wallpaper.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The execution of\nPugachev's Cobra, an amazing maneuver in which a jet fighter raises its nose to\na vertical position (or even a backwards lean), greatly reducing its forward\nspeed. &nbsp;In this position the pilot must\nincrease power to maintain constant altitude, which, combined with a continued\nforward motion without roll or yaw, is a prerequisite of a properly executed\nCobra.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A layer of\nradar-absorbent material has been applied to the engine inlets and the front\nstages of the engine compressor, halving the Su-35's frontal radar\ncross-section (RCS).&nbsp; Other RCS-reducing\nmeasures include modifications to the canopy to reflect radar waves.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The radar is capable of\ndetecting a 3-square-metre aerial target at a distance of 400 km , and can\ntrack 30 airborne targets and engage eight of them at the same time.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SU-35 costs less than\n40 million USD, just 28 % of the cost of an F22.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The F22 has a fuel\nvolume of 2687 gallons, while the SU-35 has 4410 gallons. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The operational range of SU-35 is 3600 kms while the F22\nhas only 2960 kms.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The F22 has a speed of only\n2410 km/hr &nbsp;while the SU-35 has 2500\nkm/hr.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">SU-35 has anti-warship and\nnuclear strike capabilities, which the American F22 does NOT have.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The SU-35 has room for\na passenger and an extra pilot , with freezer \u2013which the F22 does NOT have.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; line-height: 150%;\">Previously he used to\nwake her up with breakfast in bed and kisses galore. &nbsp;&nbsp;Now he\nexpects bed tea from her, with NO kiss in sight.. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In an arranged marriage\nthe equation is never 50:50, &nbsp;for there\ncan never be two captains on one single ship. &nbsp;&nbsp;Rather\nit is 49:51.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Love is spontaneous ,\nand is a fresh flower. Marriage is calculating and is a plastic flower. That is\nwhy the married woman is frustrated ,&nbsp;because she is waiting for certain things that\nhappened in the past, to happen again \u2013 whispers of sweet nothings, those\nmoonlight walks --&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Why are they not happening again?&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">They cannot happen because\nnow there is no spontaneity; now love is a mundane routine. Now everything is\nexpected and demanded. &nbsp;Now love has\nbecome a duty, not a fun. It was fun in the beginning; now it is a duty. And\nduty cannot give you the same bliss that fun can give.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her mind has created\nthe whole thing. Now she goes on expecting, and the more she expects the less is\nthe possibility of its happening.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging\u2014the vicious verbal abuses, &nbsp;the demeaning talk, &nbsp;the blame game, the one upmanship, &nbsp;the personal attacks, &nbsp;the immoral manipulations, &nbsp;the need to make the husband feel stupid , the\nheartache rising out of vulgar ultimatums, the endless pestering\u2014nay- hectoring\n,</span> <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">does\nnot put a man into a giving mood\u2014 and thus a vicious cycle is born.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NqK90Cj3u2c/UoPe23bUUjI/AAAAAAAAniE/QpBv3ksPAuw/s1600/893583_f520.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"213\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-NqK90Cj3u2c/UoPe23bUUjI/AAAAAAAAniE/QpBv3ksPAuw/s320/893583_f520.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><i>Above : Standing in front of the TV while nagging , makes things worse.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging &nbsp;promotes negative and destructive emotions\nsuch as vitriolic censure,&nbsp;anger, condemnation\nand deep emotional agitation cum resentment in both partners. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging can\nnever be an effective way to communicate your needs and will almost always\nproduce negative results. He will just cut you off mentally , stop hearing you,\nand the more you nag, the less he will respond to your needs.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Somewhere along the\nline, the woman has graduates from partnership to dictatorship.&nbsp; &nbsp;There\nis no reality, only perception. &nbsp;&nbsp;What seems an imminent need or a dire\nemergency for the pea brained woman many not be the same for the husband, who has just home\nafter a hard and enervating day at work.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Quite often out of\nspite, she will make her husband watching a favorite LIVE soccer match on TV , strip,\nto put his clothes in the laundry machine , to fill it up \u2014 when there is NO\nneed to do this\u2014he has alteast 20 such pairs of washed clothes lying in the\nwardrobe.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a happy home, there must\nnever be a call to surrender your dignity. &nbsp;Support must be politely invited not\ncommandeered.&nbsp; There must not be any\nrules for rules sake. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gcJv2_1GXWs/UoPk0gUQ2yI/AAAAAAAAnic/hfUhoq5g570/s1600/images.jpgVHS.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-gcJv2_1GXWs/UoPk0gUQ2yI/AAAAAAAAnic/hfUhoq5g570/s400/images.jpgVHS.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In arranged\nmarriages we avoid, all these petty quarrels, as both husband and wife come\nfrom the same culture, and they know what their parents did and how they\nmanaged their daily mundane chores. &nbsp;This\ndivision of household chores has come down generations, since antiquity.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All\nthis is NOT engraved in stone. &nbsp;There is\ngive and take in a pleasant graceful atmosphere. &nbsp;In Hindu homes we do NOT have raised voices. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my wife\u2019s ancestral house , girls were\nmeant to be seen and NOT heard. &nbsp;Unless a\nwoman is a schizophrenic or suffering from hysteria ( a medical condition ) she\nwill NOT be shouting and screaming at home.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It does NOT means there\ncan be no disagreements at home. &nbsp;Truth\nand tact co-exists with grace. &nbsp;Even if\nthere is a minor argument, the aim is progress for the family and household ,\nnever personal victory and one upmanship.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DBBi9KkVk7s/UoPks9ntIeI/AAAAAAAAniU/7yqGLka64Ao/s1600/cegkk.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"322\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-DBBi9KkVk7s/UoPks9ntIeI/AAAAAAAAniU/7yqGLka64Ao/s400/cegkk.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No husband will want\nhis wife and children to suffer, or loss of finances because he refused to do\nsomething, &nbsp;or he is laid back for a\nwhile on a Sunday.&nbsp;&nbsp; It is the battle axe\nshrew\u2019s \u201cI want it to be done now\u201d&nbsp; and \u201con\nthe spot\u201d decisions that leads to this emotional tussle. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And most of the time,\nit is all about her hormones (estrogen dominance over progesterone ) playing up\n&nbsp;- or plain starvation of a good manful pounding.\n&nbsp;Because it is a vicious cycle, a beautiful\nwoman woman can become as attractive as a drowned cat when she starts drip drip\nnagging\u2014and it is difficult for a man to get it up. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Now what is this good\nmanful pounding or humping ? &nbsp;When this happens the woman ( in the throes of immense pleasure) sounds like a wounded animal .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>MURINGAKAI , QUANTUM\nMEDICINE AND HAPPINESS TREE VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have explained it\nvery well here.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W2Pq10OVadY/UoRNCFNinhI/AAAAAAAAnis/WWzXP554c2U/s1600/images.jpgyi7t.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"314\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-W2Pq10OVadY/UoRNCFNinhI/AAAAAAAAnis/WWzXP554c2U/s320/images.jpgyi7t.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Hardly any husband on\nthis planet would expect his wife to shovel the snow or carry the heaviest\nshopping bag , unless he is having a bad back. &nbsp;Which man will expect his wife to change the\ncar tyre or fight off a bully? &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But he may not like to\nhang out the linen to dry on the clothesline in the yard , &nbsp;because it is NOT a manly thing, and none of\nhis forefathers had ever done it. &nbsp;&nbsp;He would rather prefer to employ a maid and\nwaste some money from the tight budget , rather than to do this simple chore\nwhich erodes his mindset as a protector and a provider ..<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I remember once, I had\nto go on the bridge for arrival port at 4 AM, and the passage was very tricky. &nbsp;Since I had NOT got enough sleep, I made\nstrong coffee in my cabin itself. &nbsp;While\ntaking this cup up to the bridge I spilt some coffee on the stair case. &nbsp;I went on the bridge checked out everything\nand then came back to my cabin for a crap. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I nearly slipped on my spilt coffee , a grave near miss .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Instead of waking up\nthe steward or telling the quartermaster/ lookout man &nbsp;on bridge to clean up the spilt coffee , &nbsp;that I took a wet mop and mopped the splilt coffee\nup. &nbsp;And after that , being in an\nexpansive mood &nbsp;( I was reminded of my happy\ncadet days ) I started mopping the whole staircase, singing an old song out of\nnostalgia. &nbsp;I felt some eyes boring my\nhead from the back. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">After a month Chief\nOfficer told me that most of the crew got up from their sleep , and came to see\nCaptain wiping the floor with a mop in that unearthly hour. &nbsp;And the hot subject of discussion was , if I\nam still fit to lead . &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CZ-2TDjKvcI/UoRWr7F_MwI/AAAAAAAAnjU/z1sr8L_g3rQ/s1600/Captain_Jack_Sparrow_-_Johnny_Depp+1.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CZ-2TDjKvcI/UoRWr7F_MwI/AAAAAAAAnjU/z1sr8L_g3rQ/s400/Captain_Jack_Sparrow_-_Johnny_Depp+1.jpg\" width=\"300\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For them I am a awesome\nman whose aura is so powerful that they would NOT come within one metre of me\nwhile passing by in an alleyway , &nbsp;to\navoid getting an electric shock by induction.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">As my neighbor I had the ex-ruling Varma family of North Kerala . &nbsp;The wife was a silent shrew.&nbsp; She used to make her peace loving husband do\nall petty chores. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uV8v1EGqz4c/UoRVGPjRbtI/AAAAAAAAnjI/mufWlXeaWus/s1600/Lawn.JPG\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uV8v1EGqz4c/UoRVGPjRbtI/AAAAAAAAnjI/mufWlXeaWus/s640/Lawn.JPG\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When I am in the lawn, &nbsp;I pretend I cannot see him out of sheer kindness\n( I liked that bloke ) , &nbsp;for he would\ndie a thousand deaths .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The wife\u2019s &nbsp;nagging might be the repetition of unpalatable\ntruths, but the husband hates nagging, especially after a hard day. Men unwind\nby forgetting problems.. &nbsp;To be treated\nlike dirt by the woman he married is slow death for a man. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When nagged 99% men\nwill &nbsp;stop communicating and go into a\ndeep sulk . &nbsp;&nbsp;The women nags just to get\ncentred, &nbsp;men cannot handle this . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a man screws &nbsp;up royally , say he bought some rotten vegetables\n( TEEE HEEEEE ! ) , if you say\u2014\u201c it was not your fault\u201d, he will love you for\nthe support and acceptance as he is \u2014this is not the time to go into a high\npitched, high octave truth finding exercise. Would he ever bring rotten\nvegetables to the house , if he could avoid it? <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Men want space, give\nhim that. Man can get angry ( actually upset ) if he has no dang idea what to\ndo next\u2014it need not be finger pointing at the woman.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Give man the freedom to\nsay NO\u2014it does not mean he means NO and will not say YES as a matter of free\nmanly choice. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When your husband is\nupset lie low, till the hurricane passes. &nbsp;This is a bad time to match him blow for blow.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A man who has\nleadership spirit will rarely suffer nagging at home. &nbsp;He ensures that there is open minded spirit at\nhome, not defensive egos. &nbsp;&nbsp;He gets compliance out of commitment and he\napplies this rule to himself first.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A nagging woman sweats\nthe small stuff for no reason at all and loses grace under this self imposed\npressure. &nbsp;&nbsp;She labors to change the wind in a pea brained\nmanner , when all it needs is to adjust the sails a wee bit. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She is always &nbsp;in tunnel vison , microscope mode. &nbsp;Getting into the telescope mode to see the big\npicture is beyond her hare brained mental faculty, &nbsp;which gets its input from mindless chess board\nlogic. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She has her eyes fixed\non the rear view mirror most of the time and is unable to discard the shed\nsnake skins of the past. &nbsp;Her huge ego is\nalways on the front burner boiling over . &nbsp;&nbsp;Her own\nbullsh#t map is more important for her, than the real terrain.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 115%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She cannot distinguish\nbetween constructive criticism and destructive personal attack. &nbsp;She employs crude ego powered strategies like name\ncalling in raised shrill voice. &nbsp;Her\nqueen sized ego confuses opinions with facts. &nbsp;She is unable to distinguish between action\nand reaction any more . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VpBvsmbL3rA/UoSF9ZR-mXI/AAAAAAAAnkI/eOQZppdTdkU/s1600/downljkrkioad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-VpBvsmbL3rA/UoSF9ZR-mXI/AAAAAAAAnkI/eOQZppdTdkU/s1600/downljkrkioad.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><i>By the way does any of\nour foreign funded Indian media ever distinguish between action and reaction at\nGodra. &nbsp;&nbsp;They never dwell on the fact that the 2002 riots\nin Gujarat were a REACTION due to an ACTION of dozens of innocent Hindu women (\n25 ) and small children ( 15 ) being burned alive with kerosene in a train\ncompartment.</i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagging shrew must\nwax indignant, opening past baggage strewing the sordid things around \u2013 only to\nget the upper hand ,and live in it , and never to draw healing lessons. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-OWYACuumd0g/UoSKYE0NbJI/AAAAAAAAnko/YnYK2knClfk/s1600/downldavbnoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagging woman has\ntaken a trick out of \"evangelist\" religion\u2014 to create a \"sense of guilt\", so that she can milk\nthe situation. &nbsp;&nbsp;She uses perfectionism to achieve this goal,\nand this perfectionism arises out of repressed sexuality . &nbsp;&nbsp;Perfectionism\nis nothing but a deep ego trip. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;;
