font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagging &nbsp;is so busy comfortable in finding fault with\nher husband , that she fails to see any good in him . Her husband is afraid to\nshow any love and affection, for fear of caustic rejection \u2013with a kick on the shin\nfor good measure. &nbsp;&nbsp;After all this she may say it was not her\nintent but it was a faulty delivery. But Madame MIM , delivery is what matters.\n<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She fails to see innocence\nin her husband\u2019s mistakes. &nbsp;Her falthu sense\nof justice cannot be balanced with an iota of compassion. &nbsp;She would rather spin her wheels endlessly on\nenforcing compliance to her stupid rules . You see she is the queen bee and NO\nworker drone can challenge her \u201cinflicted \u201c status quo and activity traps. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She is unable to even listen to a point of\nview without getting threatened and flowing out a flood of tears. &nbsp;The husband is at the receiving end of her\nselective perceptions and distorted and pea brained interpretations. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Grace\nand honour within the confined of the home , has gone for a toss. &nbsp;The impressionable\nchildren die a thousand times unable to digest all this. &nbsp;&nbsp;Even\nthese small kids know that the mother is trying hard to win a bullsh#t battle\nat the expense of losing the war \u2014 which means divorce.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her love for her husband\nis limited because insane ego and selfishness is contained in it , and hence\nshe wastes her energy in resentment.&nbsp; &nbsp;Her unhappiness is an ego created mental cum\nemotional disease. The chatter of her ego continuously disrupts her natural\nstate of well being. &nbsp;Her stress is all within\nher mind , not by external threat from her husband or children.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Her queen sized ego\ncreates suffering without recognising it. &nbsp;She lugs a huge &nbsp;amount of unnecessary baggage, both mental and\nemotional through out her married life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She has to hang on to &nbsp;old emotions to strengthen her identity and\ngain leverage and hence an upper hand. She will&nbsp;\ndisagree with her husband in public &nbsp;just because he is the one who said it. &nbsp;He fathu ego makes her take everything\npersonally. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She deliberately\nmistakes a short memory for a clear conscience and hence is miserable within.\nHer overbearing ego must&nbsp; create rules\nfor rules\u2019 sake in the home; Her family will&nbsp;\nNOT even miss her if she goes on a 3 month vacation to the Himalayas.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">She will brood\nendlessly on her petty grievances, and can never hold a vision that can lift\nher out of herself.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She substitutes her\nthinking capabilities with &nbsp;loud cynical hollering\ncapabilities. &nbsp;When she argues with her\nhusband she will act as if she is fighting for survival and there is a imminent\nneed to win at all costs. OK, she wants a sense of order and security\u2014but hey,\nhow about giving a sense of freedom to other people in the house, who are NOT\nretards, as she thinks . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychologically a woman\nwants you in her moment of need , not the next hour. &nbsp;&nbsp;Some women\neven nag to unwind \u2013 it is her away of getting her problem over to you. &nbsp;&nbsp;If you\ncan show some understanding, care, and respect, without argue with her feelings,\nit will help. &nbsp;&nbsp;But remember , you cannot be an as$hole and\nallow her to carry on hour after hour , day after day.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">You breach trust when\nyou intimidate her , or lash out physically -- the relationship is now\nirreversibly weakened\u2014like milk which has curdled. &nbsp;&nbsp;If you\nhave done that mistake, make amends immediately . &nbsp;Take her out for a drive , &nbsp;buy her some gifts, give her a good manful\npounding even if you do NOT feel like it\u2014 will it was your fault, right?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Validate her feelings\nif she is upset. Compliment her cooking\u2014all her dishes cant be horrible, right?.\nSometimes women nag over some seemingly insignificant thing in order to work\ntheir way onto larger issues. &nbsp;If you dig\nin deep , chances are her intentions are good, she just needs a little work on\nher tact and approach. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">So unless you\nplan on dumping her, you gonna have to learn to anticipate, deal with,\nor simply avoid her nagging. &nbsp;&nbsp;In Hindu\nhomes we do NOT have the luxury of dumping her. The word divorce does NOT exist\nin our ancient scriptures and the Sanskrit dictionary.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Good relationships are\nbased on mutual care taking and love.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most women give off\nsignals when they're unhappy. &nbsp;&nbsp;If she gets unusually silent, ignores you with\na sullen face, or is just plain indifferent, &nbsp;&nbsp;sh#t is gonna hit the fan sooner than later. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; text-align: center;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: cyan; color: purple; font-size: large;\"><b>Lorena Bobbitt who cut off her husband's penis.</b></span></div>\n<div style=\"text-align: center;\">\n<span style=\"font-size: large;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"265\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-lTo8k6xvhQk/UoWYEIFTs8I/AAAAAAAAnmg/xICqUHwZAKI/s400/downvrhtkload.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">Lorena Bobbitt cut off\nher husband's penis, while he was sleeping at midnight. Then she drove far away\nand threw the severed penis into a unused field .&nbsp;</span></b></span></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><br /></span></b></span></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">She later said in court-. .</span><span style=\"color: red;\">\"He always\nhave orgasm, and he doesn't wait for me to have orgasm. &nbsp;He's selfish.\"</span></b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging disguises a\nbasic feeling of weakness and provides an illusion of power and superiority\u2014this\nis psychology.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">What the Bobbitt incident\nproves is that most heavy naggers are mildly psychotic, if not full-blown\nlunatics. &nbsp;&nbsp;Most of the schizophrenia and OCD drugs are\nconsumed by women all over the world. Husbands with such wives , you must know\nthat this can happen to you too.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When my parents seared for a bride for me, the\nNo 1 item was there can be no schizophrenics in the immediate family. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mr Bobbitt whose penis got chopped off will\nagree with me. &nbsp;His fault was that he did\nNOT continue humping till she too had an orgasm. &nbsp;But Madame MIM , that is not the way the\ncookie crumbles.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-GOlxMeBrZAY/UoWkx2RcoqI/AAAAAAAAnnU/v58kKml9ibg/s1600/imagnmmhges.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-zXIFyDdeveI/UoWkRWo2fGI/AAAAAAAAnnM/yKMg2w-Y3Kk/s1600/impotenvsbst-in-bed.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">When a man marries a\nwoman he has accepted her with all her imperfections\u2014 which crops up day after\nday, after he gets married --for love marriages.&nbsp; &nbsp;He has\n&nbsp;to accept her and all of her\nimperfections if he really wants to keep her. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">After\ndeep unhappiness caused by drip drip nagging, &nbsp;worse than Chinese water drop torture-&nbsp; he must decide how long he can deal with it,\nor if it's worth dealing with at all.&nbsp;\nWhen incessant nagging gets to a point where he just can't take it\nanymore, then it might be time to let go. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Chances are that you both already know it's\nover, and that is one of the reasons she is griping so much. &nbsp;Chances are that she wants to grab half your\nmoney and move on to greener pastures.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Most women do NOT know\nthat incessant nagging not only drives her husband mad, &nbsp;it deflates his libido which hurts intimacy.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Women must know that broken\nrecord nagging -- asking for the same thing over and over again \u2013 will never\never work. &nbsp;Such whining and nagging\ntakes the form of verbal reminders, requests, and pleas.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">When the nag nag woman\napproaches a man baring her teeth, and her claws ,&nbsp; berating him with vile criticisms, and\nnagging his head off, &nbsp;his body perceives\ndanger and switches into the fight-flight mode. &nbsp;Since he doesn't want to fight her, he flees\ninstead to the nearest bar or golf course or movie theatre.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%;\">When the husband is\nunder attack and in the defensive mode, &nbsp;his\nreceptive antenna for feelings is shut down. &nbsp;&nbsp;So the\nnagging woman may as well benefit from a \u201cwhite flag\u201d heart to heart session,\nthan from the hounding, pouncing or &nbsp;\u201clet ze sh#t fly\u201d &nbsp;mode .&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">When a man gets &nbsp;verbally castrated every hour at home, &nbsp;he cannot be happy. &nbsp;&nbsp;Nor can\nthe children who love their dad. &nbsp;&nbsp;Women\nwho nag their children destroy what balance fragile self-esteem they might\nhave, leaving them&nbsp;a legacy -- the therapist's couch.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Couples who went for\nlove marriages first revel in their similarities , as they hid their warts from\neach other. &nbsp;Gradually they get to discover\ntheir differences , and the woman tries to nag her husband to safe common\nground. &nbsp;How many of you have heard of a\nnagging husband ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">When a nagging woman\nsees her 7 year old son enjoying a cone of icecream , &nbsp;she has to fast-forward to obesity and\ndiabetes. &nbsp;She has never been in the moment-- the way the Bhagawat Gita want us to be..&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-LAMpSD4v7PQ/UoW9HIIcAFI/AAAAAAAAnoA/O4lBWd1XWng/s1600/imagvshjyjmes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; line-height: 150%;\">This is what she has become -- a misanthrope monster !. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Is it ever possible to\nnag someone into permanent change? &nbsp;Having worked as a change manager myself, I\ncan tell you, it is impossible.&nbsp;&nbsp; Nagging\ncan &nbsp;produce only a short-term result\nthat looks positive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VIKPY96GHYw/UoXBctsk2YI/AAAAAAAAnoM/f6upDhdQeYw/s1600/imahdjkkes.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have been a ship\ncaptain and leader of men for 30 years. &nbsp;Have\nI ever done any nagging like a woman as a leader of men? \u2013 all this extravagant\nfaultfinding, &nbsp;endless whining, &nbsp;biting criticism, &nbsp;cynical tongue lashing, &nbsp;hairsplitting, &nbsp;nit-picking, &nbsp;persistent pestering, &nbsp;phlegmy wheedling , relentless swiping and sniping --<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-pl3TjF-Eb5c/UoXDwFfMLWI/AAAAAAAAnog/eaCESvEnoUI/s1600/images.jpgoiyuhi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging puts the\nvicious disrespectful woman is the parent role and her \"inadequate\" husband ( at the receiving end ) in\nthe child role. &nbsp;This tears the marital &nbsp;relationship &nbsp;asunder .<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the nagging woman avoids\nblame game phrases, \"You always...\" and \"You never...\" ,&nbsp; and switches to a more respectful \"would\nyou \" rather than \"could you \"\u2014 she could make things happen. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Tone matters.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No self respecting man\nwill respond to sniping condescending retorts \u2013 for he does not deserve the\nindignity of an elaborate response.&nbsp; &nbsp;Rather she has to find another way to deal\nwith her personal frustrations.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I would suggest that\nshe buy a white board and a marker pen with three different colours\u2014red ( imminent\n) , blue &nbsp;( urgent ) and black ( at your\nconvenience ) . &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Don\u2019t fix it behind the\nTV, and steal his moment-- &nbsp;rather fix it\nnear the door.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: x-large;\">PAY ELECTRICITY BILL\u2014</span><span style=\"color: purple; font-size: x-large;\"> RED\n</span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\">CHANGE BULB IN GARAGE --</span><span style=\"color: lime;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"color: purple;\">BLUE</span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\"><span style=\"color: lime;\"><br /></span></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: x-large;\">MOW THE LAWN &nbsp;- &nbsp;<span style=\"color: purple;\">BLACK.</span></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Above must be done only\nif there is a TOTAL breakdown in communications. &nbsp;The woman must learn to communicate in a\ngraceful and constructive manner with her spouse for her own good. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\u2019s annoying to hear a\nhectoring voice, so the white board is a way to suggest tasks without words.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c<i>Now try and remember\nyou&nbsp; idiot , I\u2019ve told you a dozen bloody\ntimes, &nbsp;to stop off at the supermarket\nand but some butter . You will forget as usual . &nbsp;&nbsp;If you\ncome home without it today , you\u2019re going right back out</i> ! \u201d &nbsp;. Instead just write \u2013 BUTTER.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If a wife has decided\nshe wants you out of her life, nagging may be her way of forcing you out of the\nhome you share. &nbsp;This was told to me by an\nold Swedish &nbsp;captain. &nbsp;&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Over a couple of drinks\nin a pub , &nbsp;he told me how one fine day his\ngirlfriend walked into his house with a suitcase of dirty underwear, &nbsp;how they became man and wife, and how she\nchanged into a drip drip nag, and after 8 years how he had to leave his own\nhouse under court orders ( she made his darling daughter lie in court that she\nis afraid of her father )&nbsp;, &nbsp;with a suitcase of dirty underwear. &nbsp;And within a week she had taken in her lover.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Swedish Captain was\ncaught unawares. He said that he kept a check for missing money. &nbsp;A woman who plans to leave her husband often\nbecomes nagging prior to actually leaving. &nbsp;The nagging may simply be a way to distract\nher husband while she steals his money and hides it in a new bank account. In\nhis case she cleaned him out and forced him out of his own home.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7VCunkic_5M/UoXxz--MlDI/AAAAAAAAno4/LJcvZevbDDw/s1600/imfqgnages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"301\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-7VCunkic_5M/UoXxz--MlDI/AAAAAAAAno4/LJcvZevbDDw/s400/imfqgnages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging gives the\nhusband a feeling that he is being scolded by his mother. &nbsp;He has grown out of this pahse of life and he\ndoes NOT to go back there again\u2014for the rest of his married life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He does NOT respond\nusually because probably it is an unpalatable truth thrown at him without tact\nand he knows that his answer will disappoint his wife or get her even more\npissed off. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Pretty soon he will\nfight with his wife about her nagging rather than talking about the issue at\nthe root of the nagging\u2014which could be plain sexual repression.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The husband at the\nreceiving end of severe nagging may look superficially to be cool , with a\nglazed long distance stare-- but internally he is in knots with even his brain clenched.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">If the wife has to curb\nher nagging , first of all she has to accept that she is a nagger and stuck in\na rut or mud or whatever.</span><br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-MkVq1_RW0lo/UoXxsQR9gBI/AAAAAAAAnow/8kaCdoEW1Yg/s1600/stuck-in-the-cdgetnmud-2.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Above: &nbsp; Battle axe shrew nagging her car-- \" IT IS ALL YOUR FAULT!! \"</b></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">She must look at the\nmess from her husband\u2019s perspective.&nbsp; Why\ndoes she put all my good qualities and deeds in her shadow or blind sector \u2014 &nbsp;which she keeps shifting around within in her\npersonal radar at convenience \u2013 doctoring feelings just to gain the vulgar upper\nhand .<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Not many husband will\nmind too much if his wife cautions him against excessive drinking, &nbsp;smoking or eating unhealthy food bad for his\nheart. &nbsp;Rather he will appreciate her love\nand concern deep within his heart.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">But if her nagging is\nan effort to perfect her partner and polish his manners or etiquette he does not\nwant it. He is happy the way he is ,&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and it puts him off.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bumpkin cricketer &nbsp;Azharuddin tried to keep up with the style of\nhis HI FI actress wife , and got disgraced for life.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The nagging shrew tries\nto dominate her husband subconsciously, &nbsp;while\ntrying to get a point across \u2013rather she piggy backs on each point, &nbsp;to rub his nose on the ground.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Psychologists will tell\nyou that wives who nag are often saddled by a deep inferiority complex and are\ninsecure. Their nagging tries to camouflage this feeling of inadequacy-- it provides\nan illusion of power and superiority.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">No marital relationship is that\nperfect ( leave out Capt Ajit Vadakayil ).&nbsp;\n&nbsp;At one time or another, one\npartner will &nbsp;end up doing something that\nupsets or annoys the other.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-xpiXYPCxVAk/UoYLAOqG52I/AAAAAAAAnpY/WwWHNu83W_s/s1600/marriage.counselethedlor.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Only by eliminating\nnagging can you eliminate negativity, resentment and hostility. Only then can\nthe your relationship &nbsp;blossom . &nbsp;Marriage has to be viewed as a compromise, in\nthis context\u2014if you want to foster acceptance and a &nbsp;healthy relationship.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Remember it is within your\ncontrol to turn this situation around for the sake of happiness and peace at\nhome \u2014and for the benefit of your children who are in the cross fire or wind\ntunnel or whatever. &nbsp;All it requires is\nsome emotional integrity. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Home is a place to de-stress,\nif you have some commonsense , you will know what I mean. No point in white\nknuckling your life at home. &nbsp;Remember it\nnever hurts to ask politely rather than complain like a bit#h.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u7AahDmG3Dc/UoZVpPPum_I/AAAAAAAAnp4/8kOL0XALPks/s1600/download.jpgg3gh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"289\" src=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u7AahDmG3Dc/UoZVpPPum_I/AAAAAAAAnp4/8kOL0XALPks/s400/download.jpgg3gh.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A husband \u2013wife relationship\nis inter-dependence, with of course a fair amount of independence. There is NO need to box each other in. Get rid\nof the negative energy in the house. &nbsp;Focus\non the positive in the relationship and refuse to allow negativity into your\nrelationship space.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Negativity in a\nmarriage is emotionally draining, and constant negativity and complaining on\nthe part of the wife may make the husband simply give up trying to be\npositive.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dhBYnMWw3pc/UoZasDxLRkI/AAAAAAAAnqM/abEdob2DZaQ/s1600/no_nagging_zone_print-r4bekjh+uic6b20a5114ecbbe9005d2a6d67406_w2q_8byvr_512.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-dhBYnMWw3pc/UoZasDxLRkI/AAAAAAAAnqM/abEdob2DZaQ/s400/no_nagging_zone_print-r4bekjh+uic6b20a5114ecbbe9005d2a6d67406_w2q_8byvr_512.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Whatever is needed must be requested in a polite and\nrespectful manner.&nbsp; If the wife wants a\nheart to heart , first ask if it is a good time to talk. &nbsp;Just say what you want and then shut up\u2014don\u2019t go\non and on. &nbsp;&nbsp;Shed your high and mighty\nattitude. Remember your husband does NOT have the same priorities as you. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Let him do certain\nthings on his own terms. &nbsp;Men love the feeling\ninvolved in making his woman happy, and they become more giving and proactive\nin response to being appreciated.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The woman may perceive\nthat thinking aloud as being a good thing at home. When you are a certified nag\n, even this is construed as nagging.<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The poor guy will think\nthat by thinking aloud his wife is giving him a list of problems that she\nexpects him to fix, </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">and will get\nstressed out. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">It</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">is better NOT to do that.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ti5zJl-L5KQ/UoZZ-tlcpsI/AAAAAAAAnqE/jCGMDMV6bfw/s1600/ikho+hmages.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"320\" src=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-ti5zJl-L5KQ/UoZZ-tlcpsI/AAAAAAAAnqE/jCGMDMV6bfw/s400/ikho+hmages.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India we have slums\nwhere a mother and a baby sleeps just 3 meters away from the railway track. A\ndozen trains may go up and down, &nbsp;the\nmother does NOT wake up. &nbsp;But the moment\nher baby even whimpers in the sleep, the mother wakes up to nurse the baby . &nbsp;Same with loud nagging for the man \u2014 his brains\nfilters it out.</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man with a nagging\nwife must know the symptoms of obsessive compulsive disorder\u2014 OCD\u2014in which case\nhis wife need all his support and love , till she can be cured or managed..</span>&nbsp;</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\nSame way, <span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It\nhas been shown medically that during a woman's ovulation and menstruation,\nparticular hormones are being released and these hormones have some irritable\neffect on the woman, which for some can be translated as nagging.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\">Only the erudite woman will understand what\nis happening to her from her insides. </span>&nbsp;<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">For women,\nprogesterone and estrogen must be maintained in a delicate balance to ensure\noptimal sexual health. &nbsp;Estrogen\ndominance is a common problem observed in nagging women of all ages.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Women suffering from\nlow levels of progesterone or too much estrogen may find their mental state\nunraveling and their relationships difficult to manage. &nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The man must know that\nestrogen powered nagging is NOT a behavior pattern motivated by a need for\ndominance.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-uqYB_eck2W8/UoZpslm49OI/AAAAAAAAnq0/0MnPEfxEvpI/s1600/downlkugvyoad.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In my home there is\nhardly a waking hour where we do NOT laugh and make merry. &nbsp;There is no feeling in anybody , to lash out\nat anybody . &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nobody has the sneaky feeling\nthat he or she is under attack. &nbsp;My home\nhas never known backbiting, &nbsp;griping and\nbad mouthing. There is never splitting of hairs. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We have never tried to\nchange the culture in which we grew up, &nbsp;and hence we are in our comfort zones. &nbsp;As the man of the house, &nbsp;my position is never ever under threat. &nbsp;My position is less as a controller and more\nas a coordinator. &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I balance my authority at\nhome, with a sense of humour. &nbsp;Laughter\nis extra ordinarily liberating as well as healing. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sailors who have sailed\nwith me will vouch that the captain is a Master in Humor Management.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><b>HUMOR MANAGEMENT VADAKAYIL</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Shared laughter creates\na bond . Laughter is the shortest distance between human hearts . Lasting\nhappiness comes from accumulation of unforgettable fun moments .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">These moments\nmust be mostly moments of achievement while you had fun too.&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">In a unhappy state\neverything gets blown out of proportion, magnifying fathu concerns.&nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At home we tap into\nmoments of joy again and again and absorb them into our present moment. The key\nto success is to ride the line between happiness and contentment and to balance\nsatisfaction with aspiration.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">And I do NOT betray the\ntrust of my family, &nbsp;come what may.&nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If I tell my wife \u201c I am gonna divorce you\u201d\u2014 she\nwill just go to the kitchen , make a cup of strong coffee for me ( or a chilled\nbeer ) --- and them command me \u201c Come on , have this and go to sleep, el pronto\n&nbsp;!\u201d &nbsp;&nbsp;She\nwill NOT believe me at all . <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Attitudes in my home\nare caught and never taught. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">I feel good when I see my 19 year old son, saying\na small prayer in Malayalam prose before he goes to sleep. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes I eavesdrop, and his prayers are\nreally hilarious \u2013 innocence and good upbringing at its best. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">The first thing my wife does as soon as she\ngets up is to light the lamp in our puja room. </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">At least you should\nstrive to make the silence between you and your nagging wife to be comfortable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">When all you have tried\nhas failed\u2014because she is a shrew of the first order\u2014 either kick her out or\nthink of the children and suffer her out.&nbsp; Remember, she will still force you to yawn with your mouth closed or fart without\nsmell. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Nagging is like living\nnext to the airport\u2014after a while you don\u2019t notice it anymore. &nbsp;And you wont get ulcers , if you know what I\nmean.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">It is easier to put on\nslippers that to carpet the whole world. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u201c Be yourself \u201c is obviously the worst advise\nyou can give your shrew.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">When all else fails \u2013there is always self\ndelusion.</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp; </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Happiness can be a </span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">poor memory too.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XxL_VqafzM4/UpJiuxeFGNI/AAAAAAAAn-8/wv78uYwmyw4/s1600/imagesCAV6MEDD.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-XxL_VqafzM4/UpJiuxeFGNI/AAAAAAAAn-8/wv78uYwmyw4/s1600/imagesCAV6MEDD.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: 'Times New Roman', serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue;\"><b>MY NAGGING WIFE </b><i><o:p></o:p></i></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Sometimes I like to sit\nand contemplate about things I like, just to destress<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">But then I am sure to\nbe rudely interrupted by mE loud nagging wife <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">She will holler, &nbsp;don\u2019t just sit there you slob, there is plenty\nfor you to do <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">As if on cue she will\nmoan and surely&nbsp;pick up mE shoe and mE socks <o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">What the hell is wrong\nwith you, &nbsp;whole day you sit around like\na lazy bum<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">Right from when I &nbsp;get up from bed , till I drop back into a\nweary slumber<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><span style=\"color: blue;\">All her nagging about\nthis and that and everything is driving me up the wall &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;,&quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I have sailed around on\nthis planet for 4 decades.&nbsp; I have seen\nwhat is there to be seen.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">National Geographic has\nrightly called my home state Kerala &nbsp;\u201c\nParadise on earth \u201d.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">We in Malabar modestly\ncall it,&nbsp; \u201c God\u2019s own country \u201d.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">To be frank, we do NOT\ncare for any certificate or gold medal from anybody, when it comes to declaring\nour home state \u2013 THE MOST BEAUTIFUL PLACE ON THIS PLANET.&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Feast your eyes on the\npictures below\u2014and keep what you feel to yourselves.&nbsp; Sometimes silence speaks the best.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>Below:Video of Athirapally waterfalls.</i></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<object class=\"BLOGGER-youtube-video\" classid=\"clsid:D27CDB6E-AE6D-11cf-96B8-444553540000\" codebase=\"http://download.macromedia.com/pub/shockwave/cabs/flash/swflash.cab#version=6,0,40,0\" data-thumbnail-src=\"http://img.youtube.com/vi/Mh_06lJG-iY/0.jpg\" height=\"266\" width=\"320\"><param name=\"movie\" value=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Mh_06lJG-iY&source=uds\" /><param name=\"bgcolor\" value=\"#FFFFFF\" /><param name=\"allowFullScreen\" value=\"true\" /><embed width=\"320\" height=\"266\"  src=\"http://youtube.googleapis.com/v/Mh_06lJG-iY&source=uds\" type=\"application/x-shockwave-flash\" allowfullscreen=\"true\"></embed></object></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">There are ridiculous\nplaces like Singapore with PLASTIC gardens, artificial fertilisers and an army\nof government paid gardeners&nbsp; , hankering\nto be called beautiful. -- without a single bird , butterfly, squirrel or even\nbees to pollinate. &nbsp;&nbsp;They have zilch idea\nwhat it takes to be called the best place on earth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Columbus set out to in\nsearch of this \u201c land of plenty\u201d&nbsp; and\nfinally discovered America.&nbsp; &nbsp;Yes, the whole world had been&nbsp; trying to find a sea route to this land of\nriches and spices.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bQVb1eYat1o/UoHQC30aMGI/AAAAAAAAne8/8B7M6l5T6so/s1600/12080_528969430454425_4055305_n.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"620\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-bQVb1eYat1o/UoHQC30aMGI/AAAAAAAAne8/8B7M6l5T6so/s640/12080_528969430454425_4055305_n.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"font-size: large;\"><b style=\"background-color: yellow;\">This is the land from\nwhich all world religions sprouted.&nbsp;</b></span><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Judaism was created by\nNamboodiris from Kerala. &nbsp;&nbsp;No wonder the Talmud has racism inherent in\nit. &nbsp;King David\u2019s wife ( and Solomon\u2019s mother ) was from Kerala. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<br />\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CyDoiB7Awr0/UoDyvmhscGI/AAAAAAAAna4/1Dpw1nGO5Cs/s1600/images+greutd(70).jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-CyDoiB7Awr0/UoDyvmhscGI/AAAAAAAAna4/1Dpw1nGO5Cs/s400/images+greutd(70).jpg\" width=\"396\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">David&nbsp;first fell in love with her when she was\ntaking an open bath ( a married woman Bath Sheba ) , as is custom in Kerala. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Aristotle\nhad written that Jews are from the Land of Kalari. &nbsp;King Solomon imported\nsandalwood to make his palace staircase and teak for his ships from Calicut.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our elephants are\nintelligent , conscious and docile like pet dogs, unlike the angry African\nelephants.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">If some spice is NOT\navailable in Kerala , it is not worth having.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Our tea ,coffee,\nvegetables, fruits etc grown on organic soil&nbsp;\nhas its own flavour.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The soil is so fertile,\nthat if you eat a fruit and throw away the seed, within a month , it has\nalready started growing as a plant!<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Malayali people are\ndeeply traditional. When i got married 30 years ago- all the hundreds of guests\nate on banana tree leaves with their fingers. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">FEED YOUR IMAGINATION\n!&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">HAVE A VISUAL SENSE\nORGY !</span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">ENJOY !<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">You can Give the Eight\nSiddhis (supernatural powers) and Nine Nidhis (types of devotions).<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Mother Janaki (Devi\nSita) gave this Boon to you.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i style=\"background-color: yellow;\"><b>The few seconds of\ntime between the second and third flashes is one of pure awareness, which\ncauses group resonance and quantum entrainment.&nbsp;\nPrana is amplified and focused like a laser beam.</b></i><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot;
