In America, it is understood that juries usually weigh the\nevidence and testimony to determine questions of fact, while judges usually\nrule on questions of law. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Although a judge can\nthrow out a guilty verdict if it was not supported by the evidence, a jurist\nhas no authority to override a verdict that favors a defendant. &nbsp;A judge cannot order the jury to convict, no\nmatter how strong the evidence is.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X4OFbtYcFnk/UnnpKZKplLI/AAAAAAAAm-Y/qPwhgkl5xho/s1600/6a0148c6884fd4970c0148c7962da7970c-800wi.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"480\" src=\"https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-X4OFbtYcFnk/UnnpKZKplLI/AAAAAAAAm-Y/qPwhgkl5xho/s640/6a0148c6884fd4970c0148c7962da7970c-800wi.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A civil jury is\ntypically made up of 6 to 12 persons. In a civil case, the role of the jury is\nto listen to the evidence presented at a trial, to decide whether the defendant\ninjured the plaintiff or otherwise failed to fulfill a legal duty to the\nplaintiff, and to determine what the compensation or penalty should be. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VY1MqiKZd2g/UnnpXUwZBiI/AAAAAAAAm-o/Ecs8giW2HJ4/s1600/images.jpgkubft.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-VY1MqiKZd2g/UnnpXUwZBiI/AAAAAAAAm-o/Ecs8giW2HJ4/s1600/images.jpgkubft.jpg\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A criminal jury is\nusually made up of 12 members, though fewer may sit on cases involving lesser\noffenses. Criminal juries decide whether the defendant committed the crime as\ncharged. The sentence may be set by either the jury or the judge; generally, in\nfelony cases the jury sets punishment while in lesser offenses it may be set by\nthe judge.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m76R9ei5ATE/UnnpdRYN7PI/AAAAAAAAm-w/9s-BPd96qIg/s1600/jury.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"192\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-m76R9ei5ATE/UnnpdRYN7PI/AAAAAAAAm-w/9s-BPd96qIg/s320/jury.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Verdicts in criminal\ncases must be unanimous. In civil cases, the law (or the agreement of the\nparties) may permit a non-unanimous verdict. A jury's deliberations are\nconducted in private, out of sight and hearing of the judge, litigants,\nwitnesses, and others in the courtroom.&nbsp; <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the majority of US\nstates, there is no right to a jury trial in family law actions not involving a\ntermination of parental rights, such as divorce and custody modifications. The\nvast majority of US criminal cases are not concluded with a jury verdict, but\nrather by plea bargain. Both prosecutors and defendants often have a strong\ninterest in resolving the criminal case by negotiation resulting in a plea\nbargain. If the defendant waives a jury trial, a bench trial is held.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Since the Nanavati case\nwas extensively reported in the media, it was felt that the jury was influenced\nby the publicity.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Those who have day jobs\nare eager to avoid serving on juries, mainly because the convoluted rules of\nprocedure and evidence have turned summary trials into week-long events. By and\nlarge, only the least offensive -- and not coincidentally, the dumbest -- tend\nto be selected for juries.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tLE2gc3Et28/UnnrE2cKYRI/AAAAAAAAm-8/45DdP8z2Egs/s1600/jury.gif\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-tLE2gc3Et28/UnnrE2cKYRI/AAAAAAAAm-8/45DdP8z2Egs/s640/jury.gif\" width=\"580\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">As the aphorism goes, the problem with juries is\nthat they are generally composed of the 12 people too stupid to get out of jury\nduty &nbsp; - &nbsp;TEEEE HEEEEEEE !.<o:p></o:p></span></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Most Americans would be\nwilling to serve on a jury for a day. Few would be willing to do so for a week,\nand none for over a month.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oVle2sh93tI/UnnrTQ3_7-I/AAAAAAAAm_E/gqX7zOWJGkw/s1600/jury.bmp\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"554\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-oVle2sh93tI/UnnrTQ3_7-I/AAAAAAAAm_E/gqX7zOWJGkw/s640/jury.bmp\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes jurors are\npaid a small amount but it is usually much less than they would have earned at\ntheir regular job.&nbsp; The judge might ask\nthe jurors to raise their hands if they are friends or acquaintances of any of\nthe people involved in the case. . If a juror gives an answer that the judge\nagrees shows a lack of impartiality, the juror can be dismissed \"for\ncause.\" <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jury trials were\nintroduced in Russia in 1864, abolished by the Russian revolution in 1917, and\nreintroduced in 1993<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In the OJ Simpson trial\nthe Jury pool was 40% white, 28% black, 17% Hispanic, and 15% Asian. In this\ncase a black man had allegedly killed his white wife.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u8UoIrzg7to/UnnxQOw2VBI/AAAAAAAAm_o/bJQy19_Bmac/s1600/My-Cousin-Vinny-Poster.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"640\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-u8UoIrzg7to/UnnxQOw2VBI/AAAAAAAAm_o/bJQy19_Bmac/s640/My-Cousin-Vinny-Poster.jpg\" width=\"428\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b>Sample questions to\njury --</b><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><b><br /></b></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>39. While in school,\nwhat was your favorite subject? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>40. What was your least\nfavorite subject? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>162. Have you ever\nexperienced domestic violence in your home, either growing up or as an\nadult?&nbsp; Please describe the circumstances\nand the impact it has had upon you. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>186. Have you ever dated\na person of a different race? Yes?&nbsp;\nNo?&nbsp; If yes, how did you feel\nabout it? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>201.&nbsp; Do you have a religious affiliation or\npreference?&nbsp; Yes? No?&nbsp; If yes, please describe. How important would\nyou say religion is in your life? Would anything about your religious beliefs\nmake it difficult for you to sit in judgement of another person?&nbsp; Yes?&nbsp;\nNo?&nbsp; Possibly? How often do you\nattend religious services? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>202. What is your\npolitical affiliation? (Please circle) 1. Democrat&nbsp;&nbsp; 2. Republican&nbsp; 3. Independent&nbsp;&nbsp; 4. Other (please specify) <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>205. Do you consider\nyourself politically: Active?&nbsp; Moderately\nactive?&nbsp; Inactive? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>211. Have you ever\nprovided a urine sample to be analyzed for any purpose?&nbsp; Yes?&nbsp;\nNo?&nbsp; If yes, did you feel\ncomfortable with the accuracy of the results?&nbsp;\nYes?&nbsp; No? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>212. Do you believe it\nis immoral or wrong to do an amniocentesis to determine whether a fetus had a\ngenetic defect?&nbsp; Yes? No? Don\u2019t have an\nopinion? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>215. Did you take\nscience or math courses in college? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>222. Do you have\n(please check) Security bars?&nbsp;\nAlarms?&nbsp; Guard dog?&nbsp; Weapons for self-protection? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>244. What type of books\ndo you prefer?&nbsp; (Example: Non-fiction?\nHistorical? Romance? Espionage? Mystery?) <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>248. Have you ever\nwritten a letter to the editor of a newspaper or magazine?&nbsp; Yes? No? If yes, what was the subject matter\nof your comment: <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>251. Which television\nnews shows do you enjoy watching on a regular basis? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>252. What are your\nleisure time interests, hobbies and activities? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>254. What\naccomplishments in your life are you most proud of? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>255. What groups ore\norganizations do you belong to now or have you belonged to for a significant\nperiod of time in the past?&nbsp; (For\nexample, bowling leagues, church groups, AA, Sierra Club, MECLA, National Rifle\nAssociation, ACLU, YWCA, PTA, NAACP, etc.) <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i><o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>257. Are there any\ncharities or organizations to which you make donations?&nbsp; Yes? No? If yes,&nbsp; please list the organizations or charities to\nwhich you contribute: <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>276. Do you seek out\npositions of leadership?&nbsp; (Please check\nanswer) Always?&nbsp; Often?&nbsp;&nbsp; Seldom?&nbsp;\nNever? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>277. Please name the\nthree public figures you admire most. <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>281. Do you own any\nspecial knives (other than for cooking), such as hunting or pen knives? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>285. Would you like to\nbe a juror in this case? <o:p></o:p></i></span></div>\n<br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\">TEEEE HEEEEEEE !</span></b><br />\n<b><span style=\"color: red; font-size: large;\"><br /></span></b>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jurors can be\nreleased from the pool for several reasons including illness, prior commitments\nthat can't be abandoned without hardship, change of address to outside the\ncourt's jurisdiction, travel or employment outside the jurisdiction at the time\nof duty, and others. &nbsp;&nbsp;</span><span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">Work places cannot\npenalize employees who serve jury duty.</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qc7uQ1Eyqrk/UnnwRoJQmuI/AAAAAAAAm_c/3OXuBV4TUSk/s1600/juryduty-600x384.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"255\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-qc7uQ1Eyqrk/UnnwRoJQmuI/AAAAAAAAm_c/3OXuBV4TUSk/s400/juryduty-600x384.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><i>&nbsp;&nbsp;</i></span><span style=\"line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;</span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">In India there has\nnever been a single case in which a person was prosecuted and PUNISHED for\nmaking a false statement before the court. &nbsp;Under Section 191 of the IPC, an affidavit is\nevidence and a person swearing to a false affidavit is guilty of perjury\npunishable under Section 193 IPC which prescribes punishment up to seven years\nimprisonment.&nbsp; &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Have you seen the way Teesta Setalvad used\nSaudi Wahabi funds and produced witnesses out of thin air in court ?<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">THE WORST JOURNALIST\nVADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">&nbsp;Perjury is regarded as an extremely serious\noffence all over the world, but in India lying in court is routine. The fear of\nbeing jailed for perjury persuades witnesses to tell the truth. If the witness\nturns hostile, it will amount to perjury with no defence possible, and the\njudge can convict the witness on the spot. That will surely persuade witnesses\nthat lies are less profitable than the truth.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">In Kashmir, NE and\nNaxal-hit areas, what the State is dealing with is guerrilla war funded by\nforeign forces . &nbsp;No war can be fought\nunder the criminal penal code\u2014read this line a hundred times !!</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n</div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jurors are generally\nrequired to keep their deliberations in strict confidence during the trial and\ndeliberations, and in some jurisdictions even after a verdict is rendered. In\nEnglish law, the jury's deliberations must never be disclosed outside the jury,\neven years after the case; to repeat parts of the trial or verdict is\nconsidered to be contempt of court, a criminal offense. In the United States,\nthis is usually not the rule, and jurors have sometimes made remarks that\ncalled into question whether a verdict was properly reached. <o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jurors themselves can be\nheld liable if they deliberately compromise their impartiality. The role of the\njury is described as that of a finder of fact, while the judge is seen as\nhaving the sole responsibility of interpreting the appropriate law and\ninstructing the jury accordingly. The jury determines the truth or falsity\nfactual allegations and renders a verdict on whether a criminal defendant is\nguilty, or a civil defendant is civilly liable.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Sometimes a jury makes\nspecific findings of fact in what is called a \"special verdict.\" A\nverdict without specific findings of fact that includes only findings of guilt,\nor civil liability and an overall amount of civil damages, if awarded, is\ncalled a \"general verdict.\"<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; font-size: 12pt; line-height: 150%;\">There is a school of thought\nthat it may be more difficult to corrupt 12 jurors than one judges. Juries\nrepresent the common public and therefore are more likely to judge in line with\ngenerally accepted values of the society\u2014 say a loyal Gorkha watchman severely wounds\na thief.</span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the other hand the\njury members are more susceptible to the rhetoric impressions and mesmerised by\nthe eloquence of a lawyer than a judge, they tend to be over-awed by the whole\nexperience. &nbsp;</span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Like Manish Tiwari mouths\u2014 Non Sequitor , hare before hound, &nbsp;baby\nwithout fu#kin\u2019 bathwater BLAH BLAH&nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Juries may be swayed by\nthe current prejudices in the society, which are not supported by law.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">A judge can order the\njury sequestered for the jurors' safety and impartiality. Jurors generally are\nhoused in a suitable hotel or motel for the duration of the trial and\ndeliberations when the judge orders this precaution. &nbsp;When sequestered, jurors are not allowed to\nhave any unmonitored contact with outside sources of information and are not\nallowed access to the news or other media.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The jury is a body of\npeople, known as jurors, who are sworn to hear the evidence in a legal matter,\ndetermine what they believe to be fact and thereby render an impartial verdict.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I7Q1vW7uVjI/UnoOv3Nvp0I/AAAAAAAAnAQ/Tpo6xptb8P8/s1600/images.jpgnkl;ygb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-I7Q1vW7uVjI/UnoOv3Nvp0I/AAAAAAAAnAQ/Tpo6xptb8P8/s400/images.jpgnkl;ygb.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Take your pick from\nthese below--<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Jurors may be tempted\nto reach a quick verdict in order to get it over with and go home. &nbsp;Juries are not\nrequired to give reasons for verdicts, so they could be day dreaming for all you know . Civic duty is indeed a rare opportunity for\ncitizenship. &nbsp;Jurors can become bored and mentally blaned out during the trial. &nbsp;Horrific cases can seriously traumatise jurors who have to sit through harrowing evidence. &nbsp;Many jurors in civil\ntrials involving financial matters do not grasp the evidence presented. &nbsp;The\naverage juror does not understand complex evidence in some trials regardless of\nhis qualifications. &nbsp;It is difficult for jurors to assess the reliability of\nwitnesses or evidence.<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gQsf50NgP4o/UnoUI6AZUaI/AAAAAAAAnAg/PERcfC88o5w/s1600/images.jpgjkgob.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"180\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-gQsf50NgP4o/UnoUI6AZUaI/AAAAAAAAnAg/PERcfC88o5w/s320/images.jpgjkgob.jpg\" width=\"320\" /></a></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">George Michael\nZimmerman &nbsp;is an American best known for\nfatally shooting a black Trayvon Martin on February 26, 2012, in Sanford,\nFlorida. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On July 13, 2013, his trial for\nsecond-degree murder and manslaughter ended in acquittal. &nbsp;On February 26, 2012, Zimmerman fatally shot\n17-year-old African American high school student Trayvon Martin in The Retreat\nat Twin Lakes community in Sanford, Florida.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zimmerman was the neighborhood\nwatch coordinator for the gated community where Martin was temporarily staying\nand where the shooting occurred.&nbsp; The\npolice chief said that Zimmerman was released because there was no evidence to\nrefute Zimmerman's claim of having acted in self-defense, and that under\nFlorida's Stand Your Ground statute, the police were prohibited by law from\nmaking an arrest.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UFInuwKFXkQ/UnoUdZEk6mI/AAAAAAAAnAo/yrrpE9oVios/s1600/images.jpgbrebb.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"255\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-UFInuwKFXkQ/UnoUdZEk6mI/AAAAAAAAnAo/yrrpE9oVios/s400/images.jpgbrebb.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The police chief also said that Zimmerman had had a right to\ndefend himself with lethal force. As news of the case spread, thousands of\nprotestors across the country called for Zimmerman's arrest and a full\ninvestigation.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Six weeks after the shooting, amid widespread, intense, and in\nsome cases misleading media coverage, Zimmerman was charged with murder by a\nspecial prosecutor appointed by Governor Rick Scott.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6T6gEObZ95k/UnoUjELoCnI/AAAAAAAAnAw/tSsBYvlSp9U/s1600/images.jpgiouiny.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"400\" src=\"https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-6T6gEObZ95k/UnoUjELoCnI/AAAAAAAAnAw/tSsBYvlSp9U/s400/images.jpgiouiny.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Zimmerman's trial began\non June 10, 2013, in Sanford. On July 13, 2013, a jury acquitted Zimmerman of\nthe charges of second-degree murder and manslaughter. On April 11, 2012, George\nZimmerman was charged with second-degree murder in the shooting death of\nTrayvon Martin.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"background-color: yellow; font-size: large;\">After sixteen hours of deliberations over the course of two\ndays, on July 13, 2013, the six-person jury ( 5 whites and one non-african ) rendered\na not guilty verdict on all counts.</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<br />\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black in USA believe that\nthe judicial system values the lives of white victims more than the lives of\nblack victims, which is reflected in the varying severity of punishments for\nthe perpetrators.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One month after Martin was slain by Zimmerman in March 2012,\nDuke University researchers examined records of more than 700 non-capital\nfelony cases in the state from 2000 to 2010. They found what has long been\nknown, that the race of a defendant and victim play a huge role in how a jury\nis likely to decide a case.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Black defendants by a double digit margin were more\nlikely to be convicted than a white defendant. A major reason for this was that\na significant percentage of the jury pools had no blacks on them.&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4lwBXsenAIQ/UnoUtu_Jg_I/AAAAAAAAnA4/bDiKKpg-UXg/s1600/images.jpgjyulu.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"298\" src=\"https://4.bp.blogspot.com/-4lwBXsenAIQ/UnoUtu_Jg_I/AAAAAAAAnA4/bDiKKpg-UXg/s400/images.jpgjyulu.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The\nresearchers drew one inescapable conclusion and that's that all-white juries\nare not only more prone to convict black defendants but that despite court\nrulings that bar exclusion of jurors or potential jurors because of race, a\nmajor number of juror pools and thus juries continue to be all-white.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Watch out for the 2014\nbollywood movie release BOMBAY VELVET.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Karan Johar plays\nKaizad Khambatta, a flamboyant journalist with a high-end attitude. His Parsi\ncharacter is quite similar to RKi Karanjia or Rustom Kurshedji Karanjia.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">\u2018Bombay Velvet\u2019\ndirected by Anurag Kashyap, also stars Ranbir Kapoor, Anushka Sharma and\nco-produced by Fox Star Studios will release on 25 December 2014.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">I WILL TAKE MY FINAL\nCALL ABOUT DISMANTLING ROTHSCHILD\u2019S COMMUNIST MAN IN INDIA, RK KARANJIA, AFTER\nSEEING THIS MOVIE.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Rk Karanjia\u2019s\ninvestigative journalism was all PAID journalism.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uPsR-BV9Jck/UnpQ0Zd3QCI/AAAAAAAAnB8/y9-5kTG3Dvg/s1600/images.jpggrgwh.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"300\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-uPsR-BV9Jck/UnpQ0Zd3QCI/AAAAAAAAnB8/y9-5kTG3Dvg/s640/images.jpggrgwh.jpg\" width=\"640\" /></a></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Punch into Google\nsearch-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\"><b>EMBEDDED JOURNALISM ,\nIMMORAL AND FALSE PROPAGANDA BY TRAINED PROFESSIONAL LIARS &nbsp;VADAKAYIL</b></span><o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">On the eve of Partition\nin 1947, RK Karanjia smuggled himself into a crucial meeting of the Chamber of\nPrinces \u2014 dressed in full regalia as a prince of a minor state, with Nehru\u2019s\nand Edwina\u2019s connivance ! &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Well well\u2014what\ndo you know !<o:p></o:p></span><br />\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"separator\" style=\"clear: both; line-height: 150%; text-align: center;\">\n<a href=\"http://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qsHAH0mPRk0/UnpSW7PO4sI/AAAAAAAAnCI/QL62aOKNUwM/s1600/baba.jpg\" imageanchor=\"1\" style=\"margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;\"><img border=\"0\" height=\"290\" src=\"https://3.bp.blogspot.com/-qsHAH0mPRk0/UnpSW7PO4sI/AAAAAAAAnCI/QL62aOKNUwM/s400/baba.jpg\" width=\"400\" /></a></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">One day someone asked\nKaranjia, \u201cYou say you are a journalist. A journalist must be objective. You\nhave never seen Sai Baba nor talked to him. You know nothing about him and yet\nyou are attacking him. Is this objective journalism?\u201d &nbsp;<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">This stung Karanjia,\nand the next thing he did was to come to Puttaparthi. Having come here and seen\nfor himself what was going on, he then sought an audience with Baba, which was\ngiven, not merely one but many. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Later\nKaranjia wrote a book (God Lives in India), completely revising his opinion\nabout Baba.\u201d<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n</div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span>\n</div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Because of his\nRothschild connection, R K Karanjia had a distinction of taking interviews with\neminent personalities like British Prime Minister late Sir Winston Churchill,\nFrench President late Charles De Gaulle, USSR Communists leaders, Chinese Communist\nleaders , Palestinian leader late Yasser Arafat, Egyptian President late Gamal\nAbdel Nasser, Yugoslavian President late Josiph Broz Tito, Iranian Emperor late\nReza Shah Pahalvi, and Cuban President Fidel Castro \u2013 he was particularly fond\nof.<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">All those who want to\nknow how Rothschild created Communism--&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">punch into Google search-<o:p></o:p></span></div>\n<div style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<br /></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , serif; line-height: 150%;\"><b><span style=\"color: blue; font-size: large;\">COMMUNISM AND THE JEWS , MAO TSE TUNG AND\nROTHSCHILD FUNDS VADAKAYIL</span></b><span style=\"font-size: small;\"><o:p></o:p></span></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\">\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">He was another kingmaker of film stars. &nbsp;BK Karanjia who died last year was the fortnightly\nfilm magazine , Filmfare\u2019s &nbsp;editor&nbsp; from 1961 to 1979 .&nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">The Times Group makes no\nsecret of the fact that Filmfare promotes paid content. \u201cIf the magazine\npublishes the photo of a star holding a Louis Vuitton bag, for instance, the\ncompany gets paid by the star\u2014how do you like that? &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\"><br /></span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; , &quot;serif&quot;; font-size: 12.0pt; line-height: 150%;\">Bollywood stars would bribe heavily to be\nfeatured in Filmfare. &nbsp;</span></div>\n<div class=\"MsoNormal\" style=\"line-height: 150%;\">\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;times new roman&quot; Why ?</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">CBI had arersted a hawala operator who led them eventually to a retired judge of the Orissa high court, IM Quddusi, who, it was claimed, had taken money from a medical college with a promise to help them get a favourable judgement from the supreme court..&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">On matters of integrity and accountability, the judiciary has always asked the public to trust them.&nbsp;</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">ON WHAT BASIS ?&nbsp;</span><br /></div>\n<div>\n<b><span style=\"color: purple;\"><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">CJI JS KHEHAR ( WHO SUPPORTED TRIPLE TALAQ ) WANTED WHITE JEW LAWYERS IN INDIA ! Judges decide whether judges face any consequences for misconduct. Judges decide whether judges have committed an impeachable offence. Judges decide whether judges will be named in a criminal offence. At all times, the claim has been raised that the institution of the judiciary is too precious, too fragile, and too important to allow anyone but judges to safeguard it. The judges have abused the term SUBJUDICE which is not applicable to India ( without a JURY system )</span></div>\n<div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\"><br /></span></div>\n<span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">KYA HO RAHA HAI ?</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">WE ALL KNOW WHAT CJI ALTAMAS KABIR WAS WORTH !</span><br /><br /><span style=\"color: red; font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif; font-size: 16px;\">http://ajitvadakayil.blogspot.com/2013/11/altamas-kabir-worst-chief-justice-of.html</span><br /><br /><span style=\"font-family: &quot;Times New Roman&quot;, Times, FreeSerif, serif;\">FIVE UNACCOUNATBLE ( TO PEOPLE ) JUDGES HAVE BUSHWHACKED 1300 MILLION INDIANS OVER SEC 377.
